title: HOTC Podcast
description: Life is all about changes; birth to childhood, adolescences, and adulthood. More often than not we don’t take time to reflect on the changes. That time is so important, not only to help yourself, it can also help others. We are at the beginning of many new journeys and want to share them with you. Some topics will be common, where others are not. Our hope is that this will allow us all to grow. It takes a village to raise a child; and a strong foundation to stand upon in times of transition. Blending families, oneness through marriage, relocation and so much more. Join us as we navigate through it all. ​ It's all about transitions. Hosts Instagram: @TheRealAquayia, @TheRealFloyddell, @TheHOTCPodcast

title: The Reyn Studios Podcast
description:
HUMAN BEINGS : BEING HUMAN

Here is where we will converse with humans who have an authentic story they are not afraid to tell. Focused on but not limited to living naturally, authentically, intuitively and helping to uncover one’s most authentic self. Enjoy : )

Reyn Studios has evolved, offering you a wide range of online tools, tips and destination experiences to hold space in your life to inspire change, tune up or a hard reset.

title: The Love, Dad Podcast
description: A podcast that covers anything and everything about the unrivaled awesomeness of being a Dad.

title: Clash Studio Podcast
description:
Streaming from beautiful Oak Park, Sacramento, we are two best friends who are living together and raising a kid. (Yep, it's platonic!) We thought we'd throw our hats into the proverbial podcast ring since Chrissy's mom blog has tumbleweeds, people don't freaking read anymore, and we've still got opinions on just about EVERYTHING... And we usually disagree vehemently with each other.
Welcome to the Madhouse, friends!

title: Our GoodLife Podcast
description: Our Goodlife Podcast is a place where friends and family have a chance to hang out and talk about what ever is on your mind. It's a friends sitting around a bonfire kind of podcast. People caring about people kind of podcast. No religious or political barriers.   sit back and have fun.

title: Life Has Purpose
description: ***WE FINALLY RETURN AUGUST 2023!!!*** Life Has Purpose is the name of our podcast and the DNA of The Radiance Foundation--the non-profit we created in 2009. We’re not afraid to talk about the tough issues facing our broken culture, and we’re passionate about highlighting the stories that speak healing and wholeness through Faith, Hope and Love. Get ready for a life-affirming journey filled with laughter, factivism and tears with Bethany and Ryan Bomberger on each weekly episode of Life Has Purpose! (Jingle written and sung by Ryan Bomberger, featuring 11-year-old Aliyah Bomberger.)

title: Straight Law Cocktail - with Rob and Tyler
description: Lawyers Rob Harvie and Tyler Pollock talk about courts, lawyers, and the law - specifically family law in a straight forward, no pulled punches fashion.  And may mix a drink or two while they're doing it.  Email inquires and questions welcomed - though we do not provide advice on podcast, only information.

title: Charge Your Vibrator!
description: Welcome! I am an aspiring Sex Therapist and I'm here to remind you to chill out, learn something new and charge your vibrator!

title: MOON-FM
description: Rock out to the #1 radio station in all Shushybye...MOON-FM!

title: The DadBodCast
description: Friends, dads, & guests escaping family and talking ‘bout everything and nothing all at once. Lots of laughs, a little shit talk, tales from our childhood, and stories about raising kids today.

title: Conversations with Toi
description: A Blogcast from Lifestyle Blogger ToiTime. Discussing life's journey whether that is through failure or success.  We all have a few things that we wished we could learn from the mistakes of the past and that is the journey we take.  From motherhood, being a wife, dealing with anxiety, and everything else in between there's nothing held back.  This a podcast for all. We will laugh, cry, and share the ups and downs together. Are you ready?

title: The authentic raw journey to finding your purpose
description: This show is for moms who are trying to find their purpose and learning to love themselves after motherhood has consumed them. I am a mother with a child who has special needs and I lost who I was. On this show, we will talk about our struggles, our journey into finding our purpose and creating our own happiness.

title: The Woah Bro Podcast
description: A podcast for guys to talk about dude stuff! Listen to my podcast with my friends! Where we talk about the struggles of being new dads, day to day life as a man, and even deeper topics like mens mental health.

title: Expounding Wisdom
description: The aim of the Expounding Wisdom Podcast is to help Christians know what they believe and why they believe it. On this Podcast you will hear a variety of topics discussed from how theology can impact your parenting and your marriage to being able to defend your faith.

title: theBClog
description: theBClog, Borusan Cat firmasının alanında lider tavrının bir ürünü olarak ortaya çıkmıştır. Bünyesindeki uzman isimlerin deneyim ve fikirlerini paylaştığı platformun Spotify ayağında güncel konulara ait  podcastlere ulaşabilirsiniz.

title: Drunk Divorced Divas
description: After long marriages, Vina & Cheryl are navigating divorce, single parenting, online dating, and all the highs and lows that follow.  Join them on their journey as they share their wins, their failures, and everything in between.  Warning:  After a few drinks, things can get highly inappropriate. But that's what happens when you keep it real!

title: Shadow Self the Podcast
description: Carl Jung coined the term "Shadow Self" in reference to those parts of us we hide from the world or ignore all together. Here we explore the shadow self in the world of the Enneagram, pop-culture, and personal experiences and give you techniques to use these "blind spots" in a productive way.

title: The Mom and Dad Podcast
description: Ashley Benfit is a videographer, photographer, influencer, and loving wife and mother. Justin Benfit happens to be the lucky father and husband in this happy little family, as well as a veteran sales professional and an avid student of history. Remi is the third member of the trio; a part-time star of Ashley’s life-style blog and full-time butter-ball/inspiration for almost everything his parents aspire to become. The Mom and Dad Podcast is a journey to find balance between family and following the tracks of success left in memoirs, biographies and books written by some of the greatest thought leaders across the generations; wrapped each week into 45 minute bite-sized packages for you to consume as you too work to become the best version of yourself.

title: Tita Project Podcast
description:
A show that talks about the curiosities and concerns of the Titas of today. 

Hosted by Tin Dychiao and Tita K

title: Okiem Sióstr
description:
Okiem Sióstr, czyli podcast o rodzeństwie. Trzy siostry rozmawiają o blaskach i cieniach wspólnych więzów krwi: o podkradaniu sobie ciuchów, tworzeniu wspólnego frontu przed rodzicami i ogromnej miłości, która wpłynęła na dorosłe życie.
Kontakt: okiemsiostr@gmail.com

title: Homeschoolers: All Grown Up!
description: Homeschoolers: All Grown Up! Is a podcast aimed at educating the general public about the realities of having been homeschooled in Los Angeles, California. It serves as an audio bank of evidence that we’re here, we’re doing (mostly) just fine, and we aren’t cursed to forever be anti-social and cling to our mothers (although sometimes…)

title: Mi Lengua Madre
description:
Cuando nos convertimos en madres y padres no podemos más que reinventarnos. Acompáñanos en este proceso de reinvención como cuidadores de la infancia, como ciudadanos del mundo y como hispanohablantes en el extranjero. 

La segunda temporada ha comenzado con episodios cada 2 semanas. Click en "follow" para que nunca se pierdan un episodio. 

En este canal también encontrarán los episodios del Club Infantil Pirinolas ¡un podcast para niñ@s!

Visítanos en milenguamadre.com

title: ספרות עם משמעות
description: שעת ספרות עם משמעות עם שני פרידמן- על חינוך, טיפול וספרות ילדים.

title: How We Got Here
description: Everybody has a journey. Every choice we make, no matter how small, leads us to where we are today.  This is a place to share our experiences on this ridiculous roller coaster we call life. Keep your arms and legs in at all times, and enjoy the ride.

title: A Clubfoot Mom
description: A podcast for parents who are on the treatment journey with the clubfoot cuties. This podcast will discuss different aspects of clubfoot treatment from a parents perspective. It includes short individual podcasts about different aspects of clubfoot treatment and longer interview episodes where I speak with various parents, medical professionals, and clubfoot community members. I hope that you find something helpful from each episode.

title: FrequenShe Podcast
description: We hope you will listen, follow and become our friends. We will tell real stories, be brutally honest and give you a few chuckles in between. So join us once a week so we can be on the same frequency or FrequenShe!
author_name: Nautica de la Cruz and Amy Lopez

title: Come glielo dico (dedicato ai genitori)
description:
Questo è "Come glielo dico", un podcast per raccontare ai tuoi figli, con le parole giuste, il mondo là fuori. Qualche consiglio e piccole strategie per genitori che si interrogano.
A cura di Eleonora Mazzola

title: Jess, lapsed!
description:
Jess, lapsed! Ja täiskasvanud - ja kõik need, kes ei tunne end ei täiskasvanu ega lapsena, kes on või ei ole lapsevanemad! Võtame siin taskuhäälingus ette kõiksugu kasvamise ja kasvatamisega seotud teemasid, näpistame neid pisut, kaasame erinevaid hääli ja mõttekäike, anname just kui niidiotsa kätte - ja jätame sind siis mõtisklema. 

Kui soovid “Jess, lapsed!” taskuhäälingut ja kontot toetada - patreon.com/jesslapsed ootab sind avasüli! Patroonidele on saadaval ka iga taskuhäälingu osa täispikkuses loetavana ning vaimse tervise ja teadveloleva vanemluse ampsud. Lisaks muidugi ka südamerahu vanemahariduse edendamisest! Aitäh sulle!

title: Sleep like a baby?
description:
Baby + toddler sleep consultant, mum and founder of Little Nest Sleep, Hannah is on a mission to debunk the myths and mistruths that are fed to exhausted parents who just want to get some decent rest.

Using a gentle, holistic approach to night-time parenting, the Sleep Like A Baby? podcast helps mums and dads navigate the nonsense of baby sleep without cry-it-out, or strict rules and routines.

Speaking to experts from the worlds of psychology, paediatric healthcare, midwifery, mental health and neuroscience, as well as normal parents, this podcast is all about empowering families with evidence for what works and why.

For more information about Hannah she is on Instagram @LittleNestSleep or go to LittleNest.uk.

title: Nutrimamma - Ask the Experts
description: Founder of Nutrimamma Dr Federica Amati, interviews experts and visionaries on a variety of topics all about health and wellbeing. Our aim is to give our listeners evidence-based tools to nourish themselves and their families with clear, actionable information based on science.

title: Laugh So You Don't Cry
description: Hey! We’re Mike and Paige, college sweethearts with four kids who love laughing and being ridiculous. Marriage & kids have provided us with an insane amount of hilarious situations. Come along and Laugh So You Don’t Cry.

title: MaxiMOM Effort
description:
Laura and Stepfanie are cousins living states away from each other discussing life and trying their best to not suck at this parenting thing. 

We like to drink wine and don't hold back on the swearing when we get a chance.

title: Riker Explains It All
description: Explaining parts of my life as I’ve experienced it!

title: From The Heart Kuch Dil Se by Shazia Habib
description: From The Heart will give you stories,  perspectives & conversations that affect our diverse community in different ways. Some might feel strongly for a cause, others share conflicting opinions about it. So let's come together & talk... from the heart...the only way forward!

title: The Unfinished Cubby
description:
Finding balance in your many life aspirations.

The Unfinished Cubby is a Podcast by Kris Randall, the founder of CoCreations,
About running a business; raising a family; philosophy, purpose, & meaning; and creating & maintaining a healthy & happy work-life balance.

title: Dads of Daughters with Disorders (DDD)
description: Being a dad to a child with a rare genetic disorder, I came to the realization years ago that there isn't much support for dads in regards to coming to terms with her diagnosis, her treatment, the life-altering effects on myself and my family. This podcast is the answer! If you're a dad with a child with a medical condition of any kind I hope you can utilize this podcast to help you come to grips, learn to cope, and overcome the daily challenges we face as dads of children with disorders.

title: Don't Call Me Stupid
description:
Just a Dad and his 15, now 16, year-old daughter chatting about stupid things, making fun of stupid stuff, and sharing their stupid opinions and stories. 
Listen in as we discuss different topics and what they mean to our two very different generations. With topics ranging from Social Media to College to Pop Culture. 

Instagram: @stupid.pod 
Patreon: patreon.com/stupidpod

title: Open Adoption Project
description: The Open Adoption Project focuses on improving adoptee experiences by encouraging open communication between all members of the adoption constellation, nurturing ongoing open adoption relationships and promoting ethical adoption practices. Follow us on Instagram @OpenAdoptionProject

title: The Daddy Juggle
description: The Daddy Juggle dives into what it's like being a dad, from juggling work commitments to changing diapers, the relationship with your significant other and more.

title: Dad Talk
description: "Dad Talk" is a hilarious new podcast with wannabe comedians and first time dads Tom Anderson and Derek Wenzell.

title: Kasia Bigos || Fitness w Wielkim Mieście
description:
INSTRUKTOR FITNESS I POLE DANCE, SZKOLENIOWIEC, DZIENNIKARKA i BLOGERKA,
MISTRZYNI POLSKI I EUROPY POLE SPORT W KAT. DUETY, AUTORKA PROGRAMU TRENINGOWEGO FIREWORKOUT, FIRE STRETCH, YOGA WHEEL SESSION ORAZ BODY MOVEMENT. OBECNIE ROZWIJA PLATFORMĘ Z KURSAMI ON LINE!

Z wykształcenia dziennikarka, politolog, specjalistka od PR oraz… kosmetyczka 🙂
Z miłości do sportu została instruktorką fitness, stretching oraz pole dance. Od 11 lat działa w branży fitness. Autorka takich programów treningowych jak: Fireworkout, Fire Stretch, Body Movement czy Yoga Wheel Session.

Dziennikarsko działa jako freelancer – współpracowała z: Samo Zdrowie, Shape, hellozdrowie, Dbam o Zdrowie, Women’s Health, TVN Meteo Active, 4Fun Fit&Dance oraz Eska TV. Czynnie prowadzi bloga oraz kanał na youtube www.fitnesswwielkimmiescie.pl

Prowadząca konferencje prasowe oraz ekspert fitness podczas wielu eventów sportowych.

Wraz z mężem Andrzejem Bogdałem prowadzi firmę szkoleniową POLSKIE CENTRUM FITNESS z kursami i szkoleniami fitness. Organizuje eventy dla firm i obozy sportowe takie jak POLE DANCE CAMP POLSKA.

title: Jouer dans' Garnotte
description: Un podcast bienveillant par et pour les familles atypiquement parfaites!

title: Milijonas reikalų
description: "Milijonas reikalų" - tai studijos "Vilkės namai" kuriama ir transliuojama tinklalaidė tiems, kurie planuoja nėštumą, laukiasi kūdikio arba augina vaikus iki 3 metų amžiaus. Milijonas reikalų - tai daugybė skirtingų ir aktualių temų: nuo sveiko ir sąmoningo požiūrio į kūną iki psichologinės gerovės, nuo tėvystės patyrimų iki savirealizacijos auginant vaikus. Kalbiname savo srities profesionalus ir žmones, turinčius ką pasakyti!

title: Child Neurology Podcast
description: Dr. Vargas Lowy explains the features, diagnosis and management of the most common neurological conditions in children. For more details, visit www.drvargaslowy.com

title: Faking Fatherhood Podcast
description:
Do you want to know what it takes to be a great dad? Same.
 
Lifelong friends, Tony Gallucci and Blake Barreto, are new dads and can't turn back now. With no escape and nobody to turn to other than one another, they must navigate fatherhood for the first time; the blind quite literally leading the blind.

How do you hold a baby? Why is baby poop weird colored? When can babies drink IPAs? 

The questions are endless… the answers are fleeting. But you’re a father now. You’re learning every day, but you’ll never know it all…

So, here’s to figuring it out, and cheers to Faking it!

title: Father Figures
description: Two dads talk about their experiences as fathers. This podcast is hosted by Austin (a girl dad) and Zech (a boy dad) who both became fathers in 2020. Sit back, relax, and enjoy these two talk about one of the most amazing experiences a man could have—fatherhood.

title: Joyful Journeys with Mwt Het Heru
description: Podcast committed to learning how to use our minds to transform life experiences to ensure we are continuing to grow, heal and reach our fullest potential each day we live. Learning to live in the moment to thrive in the future.
author_name: Chaun Bunton- Mwt Het Heru Nfr Nfraita

title: KEMOTHERAPY PODCAST
description: Listen in for a discussion about life, love, family and much much more.  This is a prescription for everyday life, ups and downs and how we all deal with it and work towards being a better person.

title: I podcast di matrimoniocristiano.org
description: Podcast degli articoli tratti dal blog www.matrimoniocristiano.org

title: By Mom, For Moms
description: We aspire to be a supportive and encouraging force to mothers — those whose well-being and happiness come second to their children.

title: 愛子さんのバイブルスタディー
description: バイブルスタディー

title: 1 Pokalbis - 1 Pamoka
description:
Kokybiški santykiai ir pilnavertis gyvenimas yra pasirinkimas💜 Labas, aš Indra. Esu sertifikuota santykių koučerė (https://www.instagram.com/indra_sarne/)  ir šiame podcaste kviečiu stabtelti ir pasikalbėti apie pamokas, kurias pateikia gyvenimas. Apie santykius. Pirmiausia su savimi, o vėliau ir su aplinkiniu pasauliu. Kintančias santykių spalvas, asmeninį augimą ir sąmoningą požiūrį. Tokį, kuriame atsakomybę už gyvenimo kokybę ir sėkmę prisiimame patys. 
Išgyvenusi skyrybas ir tapusi pamotė 2 savo partnerio vaikams patyriau, kad santykių kokybė turi milžinišką įtaką mūsų gyvenimo kokybę. Taigi, kasdien dirbdama su moterimis, kurios patiria sunkumus santykiuose, palaikau, įkvepiu ir skatinu jas kurti bei mėgautis SAVO kokybiško ir nepakartojamo gyvenimo skoniu.
Iki susitikimo pokalbyje😉

Daugiau informacijos rasi čia https://www.instagram.com/indra_sarne/ ir https://indralaucyte.lt/

title: Beyond the Moment
description: Moments matter. Even the most mundane task or activity in our lives can be a “God Moment” where we connect what we are doing or experiencing with God’s greater call to love and serve Him. No matter what season of life we find ourselves in, we know that God has a mission and a purpose for us. There are opportunities all around you and God has created us with a desire to make a difference and make Jesus known. Each podcast, we’ll be bringing Micah 6:8 to the forefront of our lives and asking ourselves how we can do justly, love mercy and walk humbly with our God in each moment and beyond.

title: The Rose Rambles
description: The Rose Rambles is a podcast where I, Angel Rose, do in fact ramble. Ramble about topics that I am passionate about with people I find interesting! Grab a coffee, tea or a glass of wine. Let's have a laugh and maybe a cry.

title: The Montessori Coach
description: Simplifying and coaching parents and caregivers on all things Montessori!  Brought to you by Sarah of The Prepared Environment.

title: New Balances
description: Life is constantly evolving, over and over again people are forced to adapt and overcome scenarios in life, or they become stagnant. My life’s journey is a constant adapt and overcome scenario. I was studying to be a Catholic priest, but knew God was leading me to a different path. So I started dating, and eventually found the one for me. Now I’m married, and a dad! Everything changes, will you keep up?

title: Real World Parenting
description:
Tips and Scripts for Families on Roads Less Traveled.
It's for parents and clinicians wondering "What To Say When." It’s thoughts from the best of both worlds- the place where office couch wisdom meets living room couch experience.  Race. Gender. Adoption. Child Psychology.  

I look forward sharing this with you!

title: SmartLoving Conversations
description:
A place to discuss all things Catholic marriage!  Married life is messy!
Hosted by Francine Pirola and Laura Cain, our live conversations seek to go deeper into the mystery - and the messy reality - of living Catholic marriage.
With our guests, we explore love, marriage, family and living our Catholic faith.
We've set our sights on heaven but our real and honest conversations keep our feet on the ground. We've had our triumphs and struggles and so have our guests.
For smarter or dumber, for happy or grumpy, in abundance and scarcity - we're ready to talk!

title: lifelist.us
description: http://www.LifeList.us & Curiosity BlogCast reflects inspirational wit & wisdom from history, philosophy, religion, science & law.  Join our Blog & Podcast and share common sense, jokes, truth, goals and benchmarks for successful living.

title: The Lantern on the Wall
description: A podcast dedicated to offering guidance and assistance to those who are struggling with aspects of their own life’s journey.

title: FAIRY FRIDAY
description:
Bạn có còn nhớ kỉ niệm thời thơ ấu gọi 1080 nghe các cô tổng đài kể truyện cổ tích cho nghe? Có một cái gì đó rất thú vị, rất khác khi nghe những câu chuyện từ một ai đó khác với giọng thân thuộc của Bà hay Mẹ thủ thỉ hằng đêm... 

Fairy Friday góp nhặt những câu chuyện cổ tích từ khắp nơi trên thế giới. Có những truyện nội dung rất quen, nhưng tới từ một đất nước hoàn toàn khiến bạn bất ngờ. Có những truyện bạn chưa nghe bao giờ, và rất nên nghe.

Mong rằng Fairy Friday có thể mang tới cho bạn những phút giây nhẹ nhàng, thư giãn. Một nút follow và share của bạn sẽ là động lực rất lớn cho Fairy Friday!

title: Early Years Parenting Podcast
description: Podcasts from Number 9 The Nursery in Croydon all on supporting parents through the early years.

title: Kendall County Connections
description: This podcast is to educate, promote awareness of resources for Kendall County Texas and connect people.

title: Call Your Mom
description: Join Kristi, a mom, and Jordan, a daughter, on one of our daily phone calls! We talk about all sorts of things, from vacations to dreams, moving apartments to weddings, and everything in between. Sometimes, we even stay on topic! It’s time to Call Your Mom!

title: Camino a la fertilidad - Igenomix
description:
¡Bienvenido al Podcast de Igenomix! 
Semanalmente, subiremos contenido sobre fertilidad, testimonios reales de luchadoras que consiguieron su sueño de ser madre, entrevistas con científicos, congelación de óvulos y mucho, mucho más. 
Suscríbite para estar informado y no perderte ningún episiodio.

title: Dad At 65
description: Dad at 65 was created with the goal of allowing an older dad, James Dudelson, to share his hilarious parenting experiences. However, it has since evolved to become inclusive of all aspects of what parenting means, which are always served with a generous dollop of humor.

title: Paden Full Podcast
description: JP and Mea mull over "hot topics" in marriage, especially what it means to be in the coveted "honeymoon phase" after more than 18 years together. Other topics include sexy time, deciding on dinner, and parenting a child with a developmental disability, all set to the original music of Good Question?. Have a relationship? Have a laugh!

title: Layers Within
description: Layers Within is a platform founded to share real-lived life experiences in the realm of Pregnancy, Birth, the Postpartum and Bereavement phase. The stories are shared to bring insight so that they may become your profound companionship in your own life's journeys

title: Rhode Island Youth Mental Health Webinar Series
description:
Welcome to the Rhode Island Youth Mental Health Webinar Series, funded by the Rhode Island Department of Health. This series of webinars, presented by industry professionals, is designed to increase the awareness of parents, educators, and youths themselves of the mental health problems facing today's youth. 

For More Information, Check Out Our Social Media:
Website: www.risas.org/
Facebook: @RISASorg
Instagram: @risas_org
Twitter: @RISAS_Org

title: Wright Family Law Divorce Podcast
description:
Attorney and Host Ellen Wright gives insight, perspective and coaching to individuals and families going through the family court and divorce process. Various topics surrounding divorce are discussed as well as news, tips and tricks that anyone going through divorce or the family court process will want to consider.  Remember: Knowledge is power and you don’t have to go through this alone!

wrightfamilylawgroup.com 
exhaledivorcemediation.com

title: Dr. Tom Curran Podcast
description: Weekday Podcast from Dr. Tom Curran to awaken, unearth, and explore the riches of our Catholic Faith! Dr. Curran received his PhD in systematic theology from the Catholic University of America in Washington, D.C., a graduate degree in theology from the Gregorian University in Rome, and has an undergraduate degree in philosophy. For over 15 years Dr. Curran has been the host of a Catholic weekday radio show and podcast that airs on more than 10 stations and reaches tens of thousands of Catholics online. Dr. Curran is the author of five books including The Mass: Four Encounters with Jesus That Will Change Your Life, which was listed on Top 10 Catholic Bestseller List.  As a speaker, Dr. Curran has given over 2000 presentations to more than 350,000 people in 35 states and 6 countries. He specializes in many topics, including the Sacraments, marriage and family, evangelization, and the Holy Spirit. Tom lives in Eastern Washington with his wife, Kari, and their nine children.

title: Pass the Salt
description: A Salt 'n Light Youth Ministry Resource for youth leaders, teens, and parents. Every episode features an interview with an expert on a subject specifically tailored to youth leaders, teens, or parents. We're Salt 'n Light...Let's learn together, let's talk, let's "pass the salt."

title: Hayu Podcast
description: Matthew Hayutin sits down with prominent thinkers working in education, parenting, and psychology. In the first season, Matthew speaks with a fearless group of storytellers who write books, make documentaries and challenge us to think harder about our collective responsibility to educate each other.

title: Mosaic Foster Parents Cafe
description:
The Mosaic Foster Parents Café is a digital coffee house where foster parents come to connect, learn and grow. A recharging station of sorts where caregivers come for encouragement and insight to help them continue to serve on the frontlines of the child welfare system. The #MosaicCafe was created and is hosted by Takkeem Morgan who spent 8 years of his life navigating the foster care system as a child. That experience inspired him to become a change maker for vulnerable children and an advocate for foster parents.

Through this podcast Takkeem is inspiring the next generation of foster parents and foster children to achieve greatness. In fact Mosaic's mission is to inspire and nurture the spirit of serving children and families one foster parent, one episode, and one community at a time.

title: Raising Us
description: Hosts Smilez and B. talk about topics pertaining to fatherhood from a black perspective.

title: Mama on Palette Podcast: Art · Motherhood · Wellness
description:
Mama on Palette is Singapore's first community for mothers who love arts. 

Our mission:
•	To stimulate lifelong learning and the appreciation of arts among parents
•	To promote a creative and happier parenting style through living with arts
•	To support local mother artists and mumpreneur businesses

In this very first Mama on Palette Podcast, we are bringing real mummies’ dialogues to a new level. Listen on as we talk about all things about art, motherhood, and mental wellness. Visit our website and social media channels to join over 500 mothers to live a happier parenting life with art! 

Website: https://www.mamaonpalette.com
Instagram: https://instagram.com/mamaonpalette
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mamaonpalette
Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/artlovermamas/

title: Heal My Marriage Podcast
description: Heal My Marriage Podcast Hosts -Pedro & Tara Goddard- Life is a journey and our marriage is far from perfect However God has healed what was broken in our union. Sharing our life experiences,We cover all topics such as communication in marriage,Sex, Loyalty&Trust & even abuse physically and mentally. We also talk about our children and family issues, and mental health issues in children & adults. We are completely transparent Real and Raw! We also talk about our Faith as we are SDA(Seventh Day Adventist) we enjoy having guests come on to interview all walks of life. We like all aspects of different people to come on to share their life experiences and Testimonies. If you have a story email 📧us! Remember: (Everyone has a story, not everyone will share) Also, Are you enjoying our Podcast Content? If you are.. you can Donate Now! You can give to our Ministry, where we put the Monies you give back into what you Enjoy! title: Crazy Moms Study
description: As a Mom who somehow survived earning a doctorate with 2 kids under 5, I'm sharing my stories and those of other kickass parents as we share our wins, our hardships, our tips, and our hard lessons. Let's support each other and find the joy and humor in the craziness of new challenges, and well...being a Mom!

title: Trumpet of Truth
description: It's time to be bold and stand up for the truth. Join host Jacob Long and his wife Ali each week as they dive deep into what it means to live life in truth and faith through following Jesus. Each episode contains conversation about Jesus's hand in our everyday lives, hard to swallow truths that Christians shy away from, with a dabble of stories about family and hobbies.

title: Lone Mama Book Club
description: Lone Mama Book Club is a positive community created to unite women and mothers. Motherhood can be so many things at once: beautiful, heartbreaking, joyful, frustrating, unifying, and isolating. This club was created to build a community amongst book loving moms and pave the way for us to discuss some great (and maybe not so great) reads. The books chosen for the club focus on coming of age, womanhood, and motherhood. My hope is that this community will help make even one fellow mama not feel so alone. Although all our journeys may look different, we are all in this together.

title: Convos on the Rocks
description: When the conversation requires a drink!

title: Extraordinary Couple Podcast
description: God is an extraordinary God and we were made in His image. Therefore, we were made to be extraordinary people! In this podcast the Lead Pastor of Extraordinary Church, James Blewett and his wife Heather take a look at some of the things that this extraordinary God is doing. This podcast is released monthly and they cover different topics each months.

title: StraightUpMomShh
description: Welcome to our Podcast, Our goal is to create a space where mothers and future moms can find a little bit of peace in the chaos of motherhood. We will use our platform to share our unique journey's to help other moms feel less alone. We are just 3 regular moms navigating our way through motherhood and the sh*t we deal with!
author_name: Makayla Burns, Cassandra Mckay, Karissa Burns

title: The Twenty Something Mom w/ McKenzie Frank
description: Welcome, McKenzie Frank here! Daughter, sister, wife, and new mom! I am twenty something... aren't we all?! Momming is beautiful, intense, magical, and friggin hard sometimes! Let's talk about it all. Here to bring light to the hard conversations and unspoken topics. Tips, tricks, hacks, and more we cover it all. Creating a space where judgement disappears and nothing goes unsaid. The Twenty Something Mom

title: Майко Мила
description:
В обществото битува усещането, че жените инстинктивно и по подразбиране знаят какво е да си майка, което създава очакването те да се справят с този труден и непознат етап от живота им безапелационно и с усмивка на уста. Реалността е съвсем друга – майчинството не е свободно избираем предмет в училище и нито една жена не е подготвена за нещата, които ѝ предстоят.
Отглеждането на дете е истински кръстоносен поход, който изисква много мотивация, добра физическа подготовка, безкрайни часове обикаляне с пълно бойно снаряжение в анормални климатични условия, експертиза в най-неочаквани области и безапелационни умения да убеждаваш местното население (децата), с аргументи или сила, че е крайно време да тръгнат по правия път.
Въпреки това, всички майки си приличаме – ние сме онези готини мацки, които до скоро са кръстосвали баровете и клубовете със същия плам, с който сега кръстосват парковете и градинките, и продължаваме да бъдем забавни, весели и амбициозни – въпреки тежестта на битието.
Изобщо, живот ли е да го опишеш… но в Maikomila.bg ще се опитаме!

title: LABWell Podcast
description:
We are a black millennial family lifestyle podcast, hosted by husband and wife team Gregory and Shannon Beacham, our children and the occasional special guest. We cover a wide range of topics from yoga and gardening to anime and video games. Our goal is to share what some people may consider alternative living and show solidarity with those that are walking in a similar path.
Join the conversation by reaching out through our website www.labwellsolutions.com or finding us on social media @Labwellsolutions

הכל על התפתחות שפה, דיבור ותקשורת בשנים הראשונות לחיים.

עם נועה ברק - קלינאית תקשורת התפתחותית, מדריכת הורים, מלווה התפתחותית ויוצרת משחקים טיפוליים ותהליכי ליווי לקידום הדיבור אצל ילדים.

noabarak.co.il

title: F A R T H E R
description:
Unpacking the many faces of fatherhood, through storytelling, community and connection. A platform and voice to connect, educate, inspire and entertain.

FARTHER musters up a broad and diverse community of individuals sharing stories and insights that are real, raw and relatable on the sound waves.

Tackling the often unspoken, FARTHER is built to encourage vulnerability through transparency and bring a voice to the often-untold stories of fatherhood - to move beyond the tension - to go farther...

#gofarther

title: Winning with ADHD
description: A podcast for parents to empower students.

title: SUMIN
description: Podcast SUMIN toob kuulajateni lastega perede argisuminad – mured, rõõmud, väljakutsed ja lennukad ideed. Puudutame teemasid läbi lapsevanemate elukaare, teeme peatuseid nii armastusel kui eluraskustel. Räägime perega seiklemisest, kastist välja mõtlemisest ning valikute tegemisest. Suminani!

title: JOONAS - Jongeren en Ouders Ondersteunen NA Scheiding
description:
“Wat is het belang van het kind? Wat is de rol van het parket bij een scheiding? Wat is levend verlies bij scheiding? Wat vertellen kinderen en jongeren aan AWEL over de scheiding van hun ouders? Maar ook .. wat zijn risico en beschermende factoren voor kinderen en jongeren? Wanneer en hoe zet je best bemiddeling in? Wat is ouderverstoting en hoe herken je het?" Dat èn zoveel meer… 
In JOONAS, de podcast waarmee we Jongeren en Ouders willen Ondersteunen NA Scheiding draait elke aflevering om één centrale vraag. Rond die centrale vraag gaan wij open, maar kritisch in gesprek met een deskundige uit hulpverlening en/of justitiële wereld èn getuigen ervaringsdeskundigen via geluidsfragmenten over hun ervaringen. 
JOONAS is een initiatief van psycholoog en psychotherapeut Vanessa Maes en familiaal bemiddelaar - advocaat Sophie Vanhemmens.
Hun doel? dat zit in de naam… jongeren en ouders ondersteunen na een scheiding… door erkenning en herkenning te bieden in de vele verhalen uit de 2 werelden: die van hulpverlening en die van justitie. 
Wil je ook getuigen? Wil je ons helpen bij het maken van deze podcast? Tips? Reacties? Vragen?
Meer weten of ons volgen? 
Facebookpagina: https://www.facebook.com/joonasdepodcast
Instagrampagina: https://instagram.com/joonas_depodcast
Wil je ons steunen? 
Dan mag dit integraal gaan naar AWEL. Voor onze kinderen en jongeren. Dit mag op het rekeningnummer: BE63 0689 3013 1108. Alvast bedankt!

title: Don't Mind Our Mess
description: Welcome to the podcast where mom and daughter Kim and Cassandra Campbell delve into everyday, not-so-glamorous conversations around mental health. Kim having supported three kids through the process of getting help with mental health and Cassandra being first in line to have started that journey, the pair share stories of struggle, but really end up laughing at the end. Lifes a mess. I hope you don't mind ours!

title: The Chapel MOPS After Party
description:
MOPS is where the party is at! We love hearing speakers at our MOPS meetings and wanted to continue the conversation and dig a little deeper. So, hosts Somer and Barclay have created a podcast where we can do just that! Hence, the After Party! Somer and Barclay are long-time besties and both professional Uber drivers, chefs, maids, party planners, executive assistants, home designers and organizers extraordinaire - or in other words, moms. They both have been married for over 20 years and each have four awesome kiddos. Each episode they will ask the MOPS speaker to come back and continue the conversation from their meeting. They will discuss varying topics, but all relevant to every mom, woman, and maybe even the men! Somer and Barclay hope every person that listens comes away feeling like they were part of the conversation and heard something that was meaningful to them. 

You can find each speaker's talk from MOPS on our Instagram! @thechapelmopsafterparty

title: Pick Your Battles
description: Professionally Unprofessional Parenting Advice

title: My Time With Tony Hernandez Pumarejo
description:
This is a bilingual podcast created by Tony Hernandez Pumarejo. Tony is a person that was diagnosed with Autism at age 3. Throughout his life, Tony has gone through different struggles such as being nonverbal until age 4, struggled with social communication, making friends, social rejection, severe anxiety, depression, bullying and other life challenges. Despite these situations, he has worked hard to be able to overcome those challenges and being able to accomplish key goals of life such as graduating from college, employed, speaker and writer of his book called An Autism Unscripted Life. Today, Tony advocates for people and families impacted by Autism, disabilities, mental health and life challenges around the world. He also works as a television collaborator. 

Este es un podcast creado por Tony Hernandez Pumarejo. Tony es una persona que fue diagnosticado con Autismo a los 3 años. A lo largo de su vida, Tony ha atravesado por diferentes retos como no hablar hasta los 4 años, luchó con la comunicación social, hacer amigos, rechazo social, ansiedad severa, depresión, acoso escolar y otros desafíos de la vida. A pesar de estas situaciones, el ha trabajado duro para poder superar esos desafíos y poder lograr objetivos clave de la vida, como graduarse de la universidad, ser empleado, orador y escritor de su libro llamado Una Vida Autista Sin Libreto. Hoy, Tony aboga por las personas y familias afectadas por el autismo, las discapacidades, la salud mental y los desafíos de la vida en todo el mundo. También, Tony es colaborador de televisión.

title: Coffee with Temmi
description:
Age has refused to let me define myself. Seems every five to ten years I evolve, intentionally and otherwise. This evolution is alarming even as it is delightful to me, to discover layers of myself, to move out of my comfort zone, to not be afraid to see what I can become.  
The journey really started when at the ripe old age of 47 I joined the motherhood fraternity, which I tell you is a different ball game entirely, parenting truly brings unexpected surprises.

I want to speak up about the issues that concern me because they may affect my child when she grows up, hoping my voice will multiply and move us into positive action.

Join me as I chat over coffee on life, parenting, books I'm reading, and all that takes my fancy.

title: Tripped Up On Life
description: Husband and wife hosts discuss all the nonsense that has been many years of marriage and 3 wild children all with very different personalities. We discuss specific events that have shaped our lives as well as how our personalities differ and the way we navigate that.

title: הכל על תזונת ילדים
description:
רוצים לגדל ילדים שאוכלים בהנאה אוכל בריא? מחפשים מידע אמין ובגישה שפויה ומאוזנת בנושא התזונה המשפחתית? מתעניינים בנושאים הקשורים לאוכל וגדילה? רוצים לדעת מה כדאי לעשות כדי לעזור לילדים לשמור על אכילה מאוזנת ומשקל תקין ללא מאבקים וללא ״דיאטות״? בכל אלו ובנושאים מגוונים נוספים נדון בפודקאסט, המוקדש כולו לתזונת ילדים, החל מהינקות ועד סוף גיל ההתבגרות. 
הפודקאסט בהנחיית יעל חן-רביע וענת תבור, דיאטניות ילדים ומשפחה מעל 25 שנה ואימהות לילדים בעצמן. בעלות קליניקה פרטית לתזונת ילדים, מרצות ומרכזות את הקורס ״טיפול בהשמנת ילדים״ לדיאטניות קליניות בעמותת עתיד (עמותת הדיאטניות).
לאתר של יעל כנסו ל- www.yaelchenrabih.com.
לאתר ולבלוג של ענת כנסו ל- www.tavoranat.com.

title: Model Parenting
description: We are David and Farah Isbell. Our earliest years of marriage were aimless! Around year 5 we chose to be different than we were before- to purposefully bring certain things into our relationship and to keep some things out. For 18 years, this modeling process has chiseled us and compounded our enjoyment of marriage and parenting. This podcast is for us to remember our Model and to possibly encourage other families to chase and build toward their own, with planning and purpose. Welcome to the journey of Model Parenting!

title: MAMÁ SIN LÍMITES
description:
Vero Ale es una mamá de tiempo completo, madre de dos niños; “Pollito”, de 5 años, quien la ha convertido en una mujer todo terreno, llevándola a ver y vivir el mundo desde un lugar muy especial. Y Lucca, de 3 años, que hace que su espacio sea un un campo de batalla pero lleno de colores. Colores que en ocasiones son opocados por las tormentas que así como Vero, cada Mamá enfrenta a diario.

Así que en este podcast, Vero Ale compartirá contigo su día a día en esta batalla por intentar llevar una “maternidad perfecta”, con la seguridad de que te sentirás muy indentificada con ella, y que juntas, podrán compartir secretos, anécdotas y mucha información para derribar todos los obstáctulos que se presenten y poder demostrar que así como ella, existen muchas Mamás Sin Límites. 

¡Bienvenidas!

description:

title: Whatcom Birth Stories
description:
Birth stories are important. They hold significant meaning to us, as the person giving birth, and to our community.

Telling a story can be healing, and therapeutic. It takes us back to the moment that was joyous, or traumatic. It moves through us.

Hearing a birth story from our own communities is so important. We learn what the birth culture has in store for us, we learn what options we have in our area, and we can connect and build community much more deeply.

This podcast is a place to hear the stories of people giving birth within Whatcom County, WA. A place where we can tell our stories and be heard and seen. A place where maybe our story will reach the person it needs to, to help them make a decision in their pregnancy, birth or postpartum.

Whatcom Birth Stories will also hear from local birth professionals who can be a tremendous support during our childbearing years.

Enjoy these stories from our community. [:

title: מי רוצה נס
description:
שיחות אינטימיות על החיים לצד התמודדות מאתגרת.​

אנחנו לא מדברים כאן על הבטחות לרפורמות במערכת הבריאות ולא על נתונים סטטיסטיים, אלא על החוויה האישית, המשפחתית והחברתית שמתרחשת כאשר לפאזל החיים נכנסת חתיכה שנקראת "התמודדות מאתגרת". בדרך כלל היא באה מבלי להזהיר מראש על הגעתה ומבלי לוודא שזה בכלל מתאים לכל החתיכות האחרות. כשהיא נדחקת לפאזל היא מַשליטה אי-סדר כללי, דוחקת את כל החתיכות סביבה ומכריזה: יאללה, בלגן! באתי לשנות את התמונה!

בכל פרק תוכלו להצטרף למפגש עם הורים, אחים ואחיות, מתמודדים ומתמודדות, אנשי ונשי טיפול. כולם מדברים בכנות ובאומץ, כולן מאפשרות לנו להיכנס לחדרי החדרים של חוויית חיים מאתגרת, הנוגעת לכולנו. כן, לכולנו.

לפעמים היא חלק משגרת יומו של קרובת משפחה, של השכן, של עמית לעבודה. לפעמים היא חלק מעבָרנו, לפעמים היא חלק מחיי היום-יום שלנו, לפעמים היא אורבת לנו מעבר לפינה. לפעמים מדובר בחתיכה קטנה כזו, שצריך רק לעגל לה קצת את הפינות והנה היא משתלבת מחדש בפאזל הישן והטוב, לפעמים זו סערה שטורפת את כל חלקיקי הפסיפס שהרכבנו בעמל רב, כך שכל שנותר לנו לעשות זה לאסוף הכל מחדש. ולא לשכוח את התמונה הגדולה.

מי אנחנו

ד"ר טלי אשר, חברת סגל בבית ספר מנדל למנהיגות חברתית ומרצה במכללת סמינר הקיבוצים, מנחה סדנאות כתיבה ויזמית ספרותית.

עולם הנפש קרוב ללבי ולחיי, ואני מנסה לתרום את חלקי ליצירת שיח שוויוני שאינו מבחין בין 'בריאים' לבין 'חולים' ובין מטופלים למטפלים.

יחד אתי החֵצי המכונה 'צחי'.

צחי הוא המפיק ועורך הסאונד, וגם האיש שלי כבר 30 שנה או 33 שנה או 41, או בכלל מגלגול אחר, תלוי ממתי סופרים. בכל אופן, בלעדיו הפודקאסט הזה לא היה קיים. וגם אני לא.

title: The Dave Cave
description: The Dave Cave is hosted by Dave Doney, a radio personality for WNKO in Central Ohio. His sons David and Justin join him from Dave's man cave to talk about current events, what's going on in their lives and more!

title: The Four Fathers Podcast
description:
Four black fathers who have become dads again during lockdown & in their late 30's talk everything from fatherhood to football & every dad's dream of their son becoming a footballer. 

With 2 Liverpool & 2 Arsenal supporters there is bound to be some light hearted banter along the way...

title: Life is a 4 Letter Word
description: Life is a blessing and a struggle. You are not alone. We share our trials, tribulations, elations and successes. Join us.
