description: Un podcast para hablar de lo que es ser mamá primeriza y contar mis experiencias desde el embarazo hasta lo que esté por venir.

title: The Winning Family Podcast
description: The Winning Family Podcast with Rodney & Michelle Gage is designed to help you win at home and in life. Each episode features hope, and how-to's and answers the tough questions couples and parents ask to help you win in your most important relationships.

title: Breastfeeding Meditations
description: Breastfeeding consultant and mother brings you a voice of calm and connection during a time when we can all feel overwhelmed, exhausted and even in pain. For mothers who need to take a breath and feel the encouragement and support of someone who has been through it all, I am here to help your breastfeeding dreams come true.

title: CarPoolDiem
description: New parents talking foolishness while waiting in the school pick up line. Listen to us, laugh with us, laugh at us...do it...do it now...

title: Ready for Reading
description:
United Through Reading is proud to present Ready for Reading, dedicated to helping military families create reading routines that support family connection, help with navigating change, and build literacy skills for military children.

In this podcast, you'll hear from members of military families as well as
experts in the education and child development fields. Gain tips on why reading routines matter to military children, how to read to kids, and tools to help navigate military life, including our United Through Reading app.

title: L'essentiel des couches lavables
description: L'essentiel des couches lavables, un podcast pour les parents ou futurs parents qui souhaitent utiliser ou en apprendre plus sur les couches lavables. Vous y retrouverez des trucs, des astuces mais aussi de vraies histoires, autant de réussite que d'échecs. L'essentiel des couches lavables, le premier podcast en français portant sur les couches lavables pour répondre à toutes tes questions et aussi te faire voir toutes les facettes!

title: Sin atajos
description: Maria Vero Degwitz y Alexandra Mariño no toman atajos en sus conversaciones sobre la vida familiar, la educación de los hijos, los retos personales de las mujeres... y cualquier otra cosa que se les ocurra. Porque siempre es bueno hablar sobre la vida, y la vida hay que vivirla sin atajos...
author_name: Maria Vero Degwitz y Alexandra Mariño

title: Muslim Birthwork with Doula Alqabalia
description:
A series of unique interviews and recounts providing inspirational insight into pregnancy, birth and beyond within the Muslim community. 

Hosted by Amy, the face behind Doula Alqabalia; a Muslimah Birthworker currently based in the East Midlands, UK. 

The series sets out to shed light upon the misconstrued conceptions, assumptions and discrimination that Muslim women and their families face in everyday life. 

The trials and struggles that Muslim people face during the antenatal, birth and postnatal period are highlighted, whether they opt in for access to the maternity services, or not, as the case may be! 

In a time when physiological birth and traditional practices and values around birth are being dissolved, we have a duty to stand up and reclaim our birth rights for both our women and children. 

Providing first-hand information and experiences as an actively involved Birth and Postpartum Doula and Holistic Birthkeeper, Amy brings a raw, real and radical Muslim perspective to the scene.

title: Ramblings of a mama bear
description:
Ramblings of a mama bear is the passion project of journalist and mama, Claudia Magalhaes Steele. A mama of one Claudia wanted to create a podcast that blended both experience and expertise in guests along with a little personal insight. 

Every episode focuses on a different topic around parenting, pregnancy and birth served with personal anecdotes and a little humour. Ramblings of a mama bear aims to create a fun and save space for parents to share and embrace their differences. Being a parent is hard and it isn't a one size fits all! Tune in and listen as parents share their experiences and experts share their knowledge and perspective.

title: The M.E. Journeys
description:
This podcast is for families learning how to break unhealthy family cycles through more mindful living. Here you will hear about my own personal M.E. journey through parenting and how I have learned to find easy and fun ways to become more mindful as a family. We will discuss big feelings, parenting traps, healing our own inner child, mental health, family fun through difficult moments, and much more. 

https://paige-tripp.mykajabi.com
This podcast is for real families looking for real straightforward advice, laughter and fun. It’s my mission to empower families and help them find easy and effective tools that they can easily fit into the constant ups and downs family life entails. 
No matter how wild and busy your life gets, if we want our families to thrive we need to make time to laugh, play and learn how to navigate ourselves in this ever changing life! 
Together we will laugh and play through the hardships of parenting and learn to grow Mindfully Empowered!!

title: X and Z: The Podcast
description: Listen as mother-daughter duo, Riza and Francesfaith explore various topics! See how generation X and generation Z see things. This podcast is fun and natural!

title: Pittig Gekruid
description: Luister mee hoe wij afwijken van het recept, het vuur onder een discussie zetten en alles met een vleugje liefde besprenkelen. Welkom bij Pittig Gekruid!

title: As Told By Moms
description: A place to connect, to talk about real life stuff, to be bold, to be blunt, to laugh, to cry and to have fun! This page will be a mixture of podcasts, lives, building community for parents and just freaking fun

title: He Said, She Said
description: We are Husband and Wife who have decided to dive into podcasting! Join us as we talk about our family and our opinions on different topics. We enjoy talking about everything and we welcome suggestions from our audience!

title: The Village Table
description: Come have a seat at The Village Table. A safe place to embrace your journey of parenting.

title: Vida Talks by Project Vida
description:
Project Vida is a non-profit organization in El Paso, Texas, our mission is to provide services to improve quality of life in underserved communities of Far West Texas for 30 years and counting. Join our hosts, Miriam Vazquez and Alejandra Gaytan for our second season of Vida Talks. This season, you will hear about organizations in El Paso that assist with mental health, chronic care, substance use in the area, and more. Learn how these organizations are making a difference in our city!

Listen to stay informed the topics relevant to the El Paso Community. Learn how these organizations are combating issues and how you can find resources to help with mental and physical health to better your life. www.pvida.net

title: Radio Olive Kids - It's for you..
description: First time in Doha exclusive channels for Kids to bring out the creativity in them - started by Olive Suno Radio Network.

title: Queens In Mom Jeans
description:
The good, the bad, and the Ugly Side of being a woman!

Email us! thequeensinmomjeans@gmail.com

title: a young milf podcast
description: This podcast is for all the milfs out there! We come in all shapes, sizes, and ages. This channel was created by 2 young milfs who aren't afraid to talk about everything that comes with being young, moms, and hot!!! Janni Ayala & Rachel Anastasia are amazing friends with no filter, so grab a lil drank and let's talk.

title: Lens Sense
description: A podcast about adoption, parenting, and life in general, Seth and Liliia discuss the simple and the profound as they try to make sense of the world around them through real, raw, and frank dialog. Lens Sense is sponsored by Ofaros.com and hosted by adoptive parent, Seth Powell, and adoptee, Liliia Moreno.

title: Momsplained
description: We are two moms, who happen to share DNA. We sit down weekly and get comfortable with the uncomfortable and chat about everything moms are thinking about but aren't talking about.

title: The Mom Pod
description: Sit back, relax and talk all things mom with two toddler moms just trying to survive. Real and raw conversations about motherhood.

title: Tough Talks
description: Welcome to the World Explorers podcast‑a kid-friendly space where experts gather to inspire and equip families, communities and better yet, the planet to have those tough, often taboo, timely conversations about life. At World Explorers, we encourage children to have a love for the planet and all its people. We are inviting you to be part of a village that values diversity, inclusion, empathy, and health and wellness, so that you and your children can not only thrive but prosper in an increasingly complex world. So sit back and buckle up as we set out to explore some rather “tough talks” that will give you the confidence you need to start a series of healthy conversations with your child today.

title: Dear New Dads
description:
New to dadding? Unsure what you're doing? You're one of us! 

We are just two new dads talking everything dadding. We get lost, we find ourselves, we help each other along the way.

title: Caffeinated Chics Motivating Women: Keeping it Real
description:
Pull up a chair, grab your coffee (or whatever you prefer) and get ready to keep it raw.
Join cousin's and business partner's Abbey and Rachel in laid back conversation over a cup of Joe as they seek to motivate and encourage busy wives and moms in the day to day mundane life. From motivational speeches to gratitude, MOTHERHOOD to being a wife, self-care to clean beauty, wellness to working out, setting goals to chasing your dreams, we cover it all. Grounded in faith and filled with the encouragement you need to start the week off strong.
Come tired, leave inspired.

title: Tyritroll
description: Ole og Ingrid gikk fra Oslo til Nordkapp med sønnen sin på 4 år, i denne podcasten snakker de om hva som skjer med parforhold, foreldrerollen og psyken når man er så mye ute i naturen. De inviterer inn aktuelle gjester for å høre hvordan friluftsliv påvirker det som skjer i oss og mellom oss.

title: The Future
description:
A novel by Stefan Molyneux, host of Freedomain - the largest and most popular philosophy show in the world!

www.freedomain.com

Centuries in the future, an old man awakes from cryogenic sleep to face the judgement of a utopian society that barely survived his past abuse of power. In the vein of 'Atlas Shrugged, philosophy, philosopher Stefan Molyneux has created a compelling and powerful work of imagination. He vividly describes the wonderful future that mankind can achieve - and the barriers to getting there - and all that we need to leave behind to finally live in peace...

title: Calidad de vida Hoy
description: El programa Calidad de Vida sale al aire desde hace 15 años con la finalidad de orientar aconsejar a las familias para que puedan tener una vida de calidad. Conducido y producido por el Licenciado Gustavo Casanova Clavijo.

title: ولادة ناعمة
description:
أنا روان كمال أبوتايه- عواد، أم لطفلين وطن وصوفيا. مبادرة ورائدة أعمال ومدربة متخصصة في مجال الولادة بالتنويم الإيحائي، باحثة في عالم الوعي والطاقة والتشافي الذاتي.
تدربت على تقنية التنويم الايحائي خلال حملي وولدت طفلتي في الماء بولادة سهلة،رائعة وايجابية. 
بعد ولادتي قررت تعلم هذا الموضوع وتدريبه لأكبر عدد من النساء في العالم العربي، ومن هنا بدأت فكرة ولادة ناعمة.
 من خلال هذا البودكاست سأشارك معكم قصص ولادة ناعمة من حول العالم العربي، سنتكلم عن الولادة و كل ما حولها من جانب نفسي وروحاني ونتعرف على أفضل التقنيات لولادة سهلة و إيجابية.  
 
سنمر معًا في 7 خطوات للتحول والتمكين من خلال الشاكرات السبع الخاصة بك. سنتوقف في كل مرة في إحدى الشاكرات، نتعرف عليها، ونعترف بها، ونتعلم كيفية علاجها حتى تتمكني من الحصول على تجربة أفضل أثناء مخاضك.
أدعوك لأخذ هذه المعلومات بعقول وقلوب منفتحة وممارسة جميع ممارسات التكامل التي سيتم طرحها في البودكاست.

كما أدعوكي لمتابعة ولادة ناعمة على وسائل التواصل المختلفة:
https://www.instagram.com/welada_na3ema/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi8bigGyqI-SAVWaoP0ZlxA

title: Dad Of All Trades Podcast
description: The Dad of All Trades podcast discusses men’s health, stories from the past, stories of fatherhood and of family values. We also discuss hobbies, interests, fitness and how to be a better man in all aspects. The host of the podcast is Isaac, an automation engineer, student, husband, father, and son. If you would like to reach me, please send an email to dadofalltradespodcast@gmail.com

title: Attached to the Core
description:
Through interviewing guests, Q & A, and vulnerable conversations Kristin and Sam cover all things related to being human and reflecting on childhood. Join them as they talk about trauma, healing, and the role attachment plays in unfiltered discussions. TW & CW
 * The views, information, or opinions expressed during [the] podcast are solely those of the individuals involved and should not be considered professional advice.

title: Motinystės WTF
description:
Nepadoriai atviri pašnekesiai apie mamų reikalus.
Kuriama projekto Motherhood Is Sexy (IG: @motherhood.is.sexy)

title: The Branch
description: The Branch is a podcast devoted to being a resource for parents who want to raise their kids to thrive, and to know and follow God through all of their life. We cover a wide variety of topics that will help parents gain practical tools to raise their kids so that they become fruitful in their communities and the salt of the Earth.

title: ¡Oh mamá!
description: Un programa donde 4 madres se reúnen para compartir sus experiencias, conocimiento e investigación sobre temas particulares relacionados a la maternidad y a la crianza, con un enfoque bíblico que busca asemejarnos cada día como madres y padres a nuestro Padre por excelencia.
author_name: Melissa González, Valeria Alfaro, Carolina Alvarado, Ruth Solís

title: Un paso más para ser feliz
description:
"Un paso más para ser feliz" es un proyecto de Asesorías Psicológicas, una empresa colombiana especializada en el fortalecimiento del desarrollo, bienestar humano y organizacional, que durante 10 años ha sido parte del crecimiento de personas y empresas, a través de servicios clínicos y de gestión del talento humano.

Con "Un paso más para ser feliz" queremos concretar más nuestra misión de servicio. En nuestro podcast encuentras activdades prácticas y explicaciones breves (capsulas psicoeducativas), que consideramos muy útiles para tu bienestar psicológico y desarrollo integral.

title: The Yoga, Bellies & Babies Podcast
description:
How can you prepare for the journey of pregnancy, birth and parenthood? You can't! It's truly the one journey which can only be learnt from experience.

Welcome to the Yoga, Bellies and Babies podcast! I, Krishna Hassomal, together with my guests explore the journey of pregnancy, birth and beyond through yoga, science and personal experiences.

Join me for light-hearted and honest conversations with real, everyday people. Learn from other parents, yogis, medical & health professionals on everything from your belly bump, delivery and all the unglamorous minutia of parenthood!

title: The MOMster Squad
description: Welcome to The MOMster Squad! A podcast featuring real MOMS talking about every day life of being a mom. So reach into your inner MOMster and give us a listen!
author_name: Abigail Griffin, Becci Sandford, and Jennifer Williams

title: Teranga Tribune Travel Talks
description:
Want to be an inspired global citizen from wherever you are? Teranga Tribune Travel Talks bring the world to you so that you can discover far-flung places and cultures, learn about raising world citizens through family travel, and spark new perspective through conversations with fascinating people all around the globe. An experienced traveler, development worker, writer and worldschooling mother of three, I invite my guests to apply a global lens as we explore art, music, food, language, hands-on education and empowering people everywhere to live life fully.
Visit Teranga Tribune: https://www.terangatribune.com/

title: Es cosa de mamis
description: Un podcast en donde mamis primerizas compartirán sus experiencias para crear un recuerdo y compartir con todas esta hermosa etapa! BIENVENIDAS!

title: Parents in Landscape Architecture - In Conversation With...
description:
A series of candid discussions with Parents in Landscape Architecture (PLAN) about what its like to be a working parent, how its affected career progression and what your day to day looks like with kids to juggle! 

A PLAN Committee project as part of the Australian Institute of Landscape Architects (AILA).

title: The Late Registration Podcast
description: Join Ashlea & Michelle as we discuss all things education including building connections, restorative practices, behavior, and social emotional learning. We’ll also discuss working with, teaching, and parenting neurodiverse children and adolescents. We hope to change the narrative on [mis]behavior.

title: Free Range Children
description: Hilarious parenting stories that will make you feel better about your parenting blunders…

title: Amor y Libertad
description:
Disfruta de nuestros podcasts, seguramente serán de bendición para tu vida

Somos una comunidad cristiana con enfoque a la familia, que adora a Dios y que vive dirigida por los principios de la palabra de Dios y quiere alcanzar y servir la ciudad.

title: The Inner Sauce
description: Welcome to The Inner Sauce! Join host SauceyDad in discussions of self worth, gratitude, addiction, fatherhood, being a husband in todays world, and more! The best community on YouTube, the SauceyFam, has entered the realm of podcasts. Join the family and enjoy the ride!

title: Poslušam.se
description: V epizodah boste lahko poslušali pogovore s strokovnjakinjami na različnih področjih. Teme se bodo večinoma povezovale s temo otrok in starševstva, vmes pa bodo tudi teme, povezane z osebnostno rastjo. Želim pa, da v znanju, izkušnjah in predanih informacijah poslušalci vzamete tisto, kar v danem trenutku rezonira za vas.

title: CHROMODIVERSITY™
description: For medical professionals, educators and families. Listen to the latest research and lived experience about the most common types genetic diversity in children & adults, color coded according to ease of understanding (🟢🔴⚫️) Brought to you by My XXY | Chromodiversity™ Foundation. Free & paid subscriptions.

title: Compartiendo la Palabra de Dios con el mundo
description:
Este podcast es multiproposito, creado por RevelaSion Audios.  Diseñado para llevar enseñanzas saludables de como vivir nuestras vidas de acuerdo a la Palabra de Dios. Compartir experiencias para enriquecer tu vida cristiana, enfatizar sana doctrina y compartir las buenas nuevas del regalo de salvacion que Dios tiene para con nosotros por medio de Cristo Jesus nuestro Señor.
Escucha nuestra emisora a través de revelasion.org

title: Morhjerte
description: En podcast, hvor vi taler åbent om de tabuer, der ofte kan være forbundet med at være gravid og nybagt mor.

title: The Alternative Montessori Guide
description:
The Montessori Method has been around for over 100 years. Isn't it time we talked about how to bring the basic principles and ideas into the 21st Century? I've been a Toddler Guide for almost 10 years. I am not a typical Guide, I have tons of tattoos, am non-binary, and am ready to shake up the classroom and parent education. This is my first podcast, be kind and have an open heart.

Cover Art is art from Schloss Hagehoff School 
February 2017: "Uns' Maria" in Pop-Art by Sanne Berkel, Alina Röder, Alina Schluch

title: Why We Do The Work
description: This is a podcast about childhood cancer and environmental pollution. We talk about friendship, families and struggling with the reality of childhood cancer. These conversations will include discussion around cancer and the hardships that ensue. Trigger warning: cancer, illness. Hosted by: Arjorie Arberry-Baribeault

title: Grab a Drink with M.E.
description: Join Marisol and Eliana as they talk about reality t.v., family and everything in between.

title: Speaking Kid
description:
The intention of Speaking Kid is to discuss how we help people better understand their children’s emotions so that we can move into harmony with them and them with us. Empowering parents to ensure they are honored and their children are honored. Creating better relationships, healthier kids, and happier more successful families. 

This show will be a series of conversations with Early Childhood Educators, Administrators, Parents, Friends, and Families who have all taught me a great deal about parenting. All in the hopes of passing some of that knowledge to those that are already parents, and to those thinking about becoming parents in the future.

title: More Than Motherhood
description: We're bacccccck🎙 Join Chloe Grech & Kaylen Paynter as we sit here and talk about all the real, raw moments and everything in between about motherhood. We see you, we hear you and we are ALWAYS there for you. IG: @morethanmotherhoodthepodcast

title: Мамо, я вдома!
description:
Перший україномовний подкаст про усиновлення. 
Ірина Заремба та Євгенія Мегріш говорять про усиновленння все, що знають, вивчають і досліджують у цій галузі. Дівчата розвінчують міфи про усиновлення, бо вірять, що усиновлення - не геройство, а лише один із способів поповнити свою сім'ю.

title: The Millennial Appa Podcast
description: Let's talk about parenthood and life through the lens of a Millennial Appa.

title: Talk To Danielle
description: Talking about things we wished we would have been taught early on in life and how important it is for us to transfer this information over to our children.  Danielle C. Baker talks about things no one wants to talk about.  No sugar-coating.  From parenting traps to avoid, to children’s non-verbal ways to communicate, to wellness and positive mindset, Danielle works to help you heal faster so she does not have to heal your child.  When it comes to breaking patterns, she can help.

title: The Parent Sesh
description:
Welcome everybody!

Join us, Daniel & Peta, as we chat about the reality of being parents. The highs, the lows and the things you just don't see on an Instagram feed.

We talk about our 2 beautiful children, Alberto & Rosina, while casually discussing their journeys with sleep, food, parties and everything in the middle. 

Come along for the ride, share in our experiences and bring your own as we take a light-hearted look at the responsibility of raising children.

title: In a Different Way
description: In a Different Way podcast is designed to help individuals and families heal from the trauma of child loss.  Each week, a special guest will share their experiences of grief and their triumph towards healing and wholeness. Listeners will discover strategies, find hope, and understand that the life will never be the same; a new normal exist...Living In a Different Way.

title: ReidConnect-ED
description:
A podcast aimed at connecting and ed-ucating curious minded individuals with information relative to mental health, learning, performance, education, wellness, executive function, and so much more!

Instagram: ReidConnectEdPodcast Twitter: ReidConnectEd
reidconnect.com/reid-connect-ed-podcast

title: Crazy As A Mother
description:
What’s up Besties!!

 We’re Jenna and Marissa…And we want to welcome you to our podcast, Crazy As A Mother! Where life happens, best friends help, and coffee most certainly doesn't hurt.

Chat with us every week as we figure motherhood, mental health, social pressures, and all of life’s marvelous surprises. As our philosophy goes…when in doubt, laugh it out! 

Make sure you follow and subscribe on Youtube, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts! Just search Crazy As A Mother Podcast.

Join us every Monday as we ride the roller coaster of life, and know that you’re not alone in the crazy!

title: Déjame Contarte un Cuento
description: Este proyecto se creo desde el corazón con la finalidad de enseñarte la otra cara de la moneda de los cuentos que se siguen transmitiendo al rededor del mundo desde una perspectiva psicológica humanista, basada en evidencia y personal.

title: Convos and Oreos
description: A Father's attempt to journey inside the mind of his young daughter.

title: Truth Revival - Pastors Rob & Mary Malone
description: Speak Truth. Set Free. Ignite Revival. We will have many topics and series moving forward with this Podcast. Truth Talk, Time to Pray, Victorious Family Life, Faith has a Voice, and more. The TRUTH spoken is the spark that ignites revival in hearts that have grown cold. Jesus spoke truth. Not everyone was happy to hear the truth. Yet, 2000 years later, there is still power in speaking it! Speaking the truth in love will win the lost, set the captives free, deliver the bound, heal the oppressed, and re-ignite those who have lost the fire they once had. At Truth Revival, we desire to help you find God’s perfect plan for your life. Speaking truth does not always make us popular, but it does make us obedient to our Heavenly Father and His Word! Woe to you when ALL men speak well of you; for so did their fathers to the false prophets. ~Luke 6:26 NKJ Then Peter and the apostles replied, “We must obey God rather than men [we have no other choice]. ~Acts 5:29 AMP www.TruthRevivalNow.com CashApp $TruthRevival Paypal @TruthRevival

title: Truth be Told
description: A PODCAST FOR ANYONE WHO WANTS TO HEAR  THE TRUTH ABOUT ALL THINGS LIFE!

title: The Wives Table
description: A couple of wives sitting down over food and drinks discussing all things marriage, kids, love and everything in between. No one really talks about the other parts of marriage that happens after the wedding, so here we are. Discussing the taboo things of marriage and life.

title: Conversations In The Valley Podcast
description:
Hello Listeners! 

I'm Lana Knelsen, I'm Japanese American born and raised in Japan as a 3rd generation missionary kid. I'm married to a Canadian man and we have 3 beautiful children. 

Few of the things I'm passionate about are intimate relationship with the Lord, family, connection in relationships, revival for Japan.. all of the things which will be on my podcast. 

I pray that each listeners will be touched by the Lord in a deep way :) Much Love!

みなさんこんにちは！
ケネルソン　ラナです

私は1/4日本人、3/4アメリカ人、宣教師の 3 世代目の子供として日本で生まれ育ちました。

2015年にカナダ人の男性と結婚し、今は3人の子供がいます！
北海道で宣教師として支えています。

神様との親密な関係、家族、人間関係の繋がり、友情、日本へのリバイバル。。について情熱的です！

ポッドキャストを聞く一人一人が励まされ、神様との関係が深められるよう願います！

title: בין הורות להתבגרות - עם דניאל שחר ואיילת מלול
description:
בין הורות להתבגרות - הפודקאסט בו נעלה ונדון על הנושאים החמים ביותר בתחום המאתגר והכל כך נפוץ, שבו מלאכת ההורות ותקופת ההתבגרות נפגשים. מאת:

דניאל שחר - חונך פרטי להעלאת הדימוי העצמי במתבגרים ומייסד גישת החונכות "לב למען הצלחה" להעצמת המתבגר רגשית, אישית וחברתית. מרצה במוסדות חינוך וארגונים על ניצחון בזכות ולא למרות הקשיים, עקב סיפור חיים מטלטל עם תסמונת טורט שאיתה חי. פעיל חברתי בתחומי החינוך, אנטי-בריונות ושילוב אנשים עם מוגבלויות בחברה.

איילת מלול - מדריכת הורים מוסמכת ומנתחת התנהגות, בעלת העסק "הורות בין רצון להגשמה". בעלת תואר שני M.Ed בהדרכה והוראה, מומחית בתחום הפסיכיאטריה ההתנהגותית, דוקטורנטית לתואר שלישי בחינוך ומרצה במכללת גורדון.

title: lieben
description: Ein Podcast rund um Lieben. Eine menschliche Fähigkeit, die wir wieder lernen dürfen. Sex kann auch reduziert werden - auf ein paar Körperzentimeter, auf ein heißes Abenteuer. Liebe kann nicht gebunden werden, sie ist frei. Nur wie können wir beides leben? Dr. Miriam Pobitzer, Psychologin, Mutter, Sexualtherapeutin formuliert für gesammeltes Wissen in kurzen Texten.

title: Mixed Motherhood Podcast
description: Kuki and Danai are two Black-Canadian moms raising mixed-raced kids on opposite ends of the country. Each week they'll be joined by a guest mom to chat all things mixed parenting and to provide their take on topical parenting issues.

title: Maxim für Alle
description:
In diesem Podcast geht es um Wachstum, Vatersein und Spiritualität. 
Ich spreche mit Menschen, über Gemeinsamkeiten, die unser Leben bereichern. Es geht um die Herausforderungen im Alltag und die Lehren die wir daraus ziehen. Wir sprechen über Erfahrungen die wir gemacht haben und wie wir bessere Menschen werden.

title: Two Without a Clue
description: We’re Kelsey and Kaelynn! Both moms in two completely different dynamics, growing up with similar life challenges and adversities. Talking about life and growing up in the small town, co-parenting, the challenges of adult friendships, and so much more

title: Keeping Up with the Kindergarten
description: Three kindergarten teachers discuss how to get your child ready for kindergarten and how to live through this exciting year with your child.

title: Zeilboot Ruimtevaarder
description: Joanneke en Michiel zijn met hun zoontjes Abel en Marius op pad op hun zeilboot de Ruimtevaarder. Ze bespreken hoe het is om te leven op een boot en wat daar allemaal bij komt kijken.

title: While They Sleep: Moms After Dark
description: To put it simply, mom life. But any mom knows, it's never simple. Join SEVEN moms as we navigate everything life throws at us. Laughing, crying and lots of cuss words.
author_name: Brandy, Carmen, Jules, Harley, Kara, Nikki, Toni

title: Exes & Babies
description: Say hello to your new favorite co-parent whisperers! Co-parenting or not, you don't want to miss Sydney and Jeffrey's unfiltered, yet helpful chats with other co-parents and family professionals. Exes & Babies aims to uplift and up-level the co-parenting community by sharing real stories and resources that inspire positive relationships amongst the blended families raising our children, our future. Learn more at exesandbabies.com.

title: That Calhoun Show
description: A podcast about absolutely nothing.

title: All Mom, No pros
description:
Real moms, real relationships, real life - there are no professionals here trying to sell you advice or to read their next book  - this Podcast is two women, Raela and Katie that have been friends for over 15 years. Being in each others life and going through life's challenges, especially when it comes to being a mom, a partner, and a friend nowadays. 
We will be sharing stories about our children, our relationships, our extreme hardships, and amazing successes. We want this to be a home away from home for any moms who can relate or just want to share their stories as well. We think we are pretty hilarious to listen to, so maybe you guys will think so too? LOL. Let's find out!!

title: The ALT Perspective
description:
A place to listen in on topics like parenting, navigating relationships, finance, country living, health and wellness, and whatever else crosses my mind…

From a perspective that couldn’t be further from professional or expert-level.

title: AYO! It's The Colón's
description: Join Rich + Carmen as they talk about life, family, marriage, ministry, and more! It's gonna be a good time - AYOOOOOOOOOO!

Dating is tough, marriage is tougher...now lets blend two ready made families together and see what we get. Tom and Jenna explore the trials and tribulations of dating with kids, blending families, and tell stories of the hardships of blending families. Join us on our adventures of continuously making mistakes, maybe learning from them, having some small successes and our journey into the madness of blending families. 

New episodes every Sunday. 

Have questions, concerns, emotional outbursts? Reach out to us at twoplusthreeproductions@outlook.com

title: FirmFatherhood
description: Our Mission is about Embracing Accountability and Responsibility, while encouraging Stronger Boys, Healthier Men, and Healed Fathers.

title: Our New Voice
description:
Our New Voice invites guests of various ages and stages to open meaningful intergenerational conversations around addiction, relationships, identity, spiritual truth, music, and nature. We build new foundations for family harmony with heart-to-heart conversations.

 Madeline Thompson LPC, LCADC, a family therapist and founder of Growing With The Seasons, shares her rapport and safety in conversation to understand a rapidly changing world. She co-creates the “Our New Voice” Podcast with her guests to share perspectives from across the generations to grow awareness of what drives our actions. The Our New Voice Podcast aims to identify values that can be a foundation for shared intergenerational prayer. The shared prayer will grow by learning each other’s perspectives from a place of respect, compassion, and gratitude. 

Follow us on Instagram @ournewvoice for updates and with Madeline's practice @gwtsfamily1111. To connect deeper with this community, visit gwtsfamily.com.

title: Charlotte Mason Motherhood
description: A podcast for everyday mothers to learn a practical application of the Charlotte Mason method.

title: ME CASO !AYÚDENME¡ EL PODCAST DE SANDRA NOTARIO
description: Te acompañamos en el día más importante de tu vida. Aquí encontrarás tips de expertos para tu boda y también para el antes y después. Disfruta el proceso, ¡nosotros te acompañamos!

title: Rare and Share Podcast
description:
Dobro došli na podcast!

Ovo je naše: “Zašto Rare & Share?”: 

Tokom lečenja sina od retke bolesti, a posebno nakon izlečenja imali smo prilike da upoznamo sjajne ljude i čujemo vrlo inspirativne priče. Ceo jedan svet sa svojim temama. 

Ovde ćemo pričati sa onima koji su pokretali lavine događaja, menjali okvire, pomerali granice do tada poznatog. Želimo da razgovaramo o temama koje su važne onima koji se suočavaju sa retkim izazovima kao što su pravni i zakonski okviri, aspekat psihološke podrške, medicinska dostignuća i nove studije. 

Planiramo razgovarati sa ekspertima, naučnicima, predstavnicima struke, razmenjivati argumente bazirane na činjenicama i zvaničnim podacima. Navedenim temama sa gostima, prilazićemo iz pozicija pacijenata, lekara, farmaceuta, države i svakog drugog ugla koji nam se učini važan.
Želimo da teme u vezi sa retkim bolestima približimo ćiroj publici. 

Znamo i kako.
Važno je deliti saznanja, informacije, iskustva.

title: PODCAST DEL MÓDULO 1
description: Podcast del Módulo 1 de la Licenciatura en Educación e Innovación Pedagógica de la Universidad Pedagógica Nacional (UPN) 321. Zacatecas.

title: 123inclusie - 4 Talkshows
description: Kinderen en jongeren met een beperking vinden moeilijk aansluiting bij leeftijdsgenoten in de vrijetijds-sfeer. Nochtans zit hier maatschappelijke en emotionele winst in voor alle partijen. 123inclusie wil begeleiders in de opvang, leiders en animatoren ondersteunen in de motivatie en het proces om kinderen en jongeren met een beperking warm te onthalen en goed te begeleiden.  In de reeks van 4 talkshows over inclusie, focussen we telkens op een specifiek deelthema: Buitenschoolse Kinderopvang, Jeugdverenigingen, Sportclubs en Begeleiders met een beperking. Op het eind van elke show maakt Beno Schraepen, auteur van het boek 'Excluses' kanttekeningen bij de verhalen.

title: TheRootedWife
description: TheRootedWife is a space where you can find faith based lifestyle content that is passionate about encouraging, enriching, and influencing a divine change in your life. A place where you can find solace in personal testimony of womanhood, motherhood, and marriage matters that reflect the realities of our daily lives & combat it with scripture. This content will reflect some of the very raw and real experiences we go through while persevering through the chapters of life. Lets get ROOTED, together.

title: Hypospadias Conversations
description: Were you or your child born with the urological birth defect hypospaidas? It is so common that one in 200 male babies are born with it—yet no one talks about it. Why? Because of the shame and stigma associated with its physical effects. It is time to end that stigma now! Learn how to you can live an emotionally positive life with hypospadias, whether you/your child has had repair surgery or not. Hear from advocates, parents and men about how they're living with hypospadias. Hosted by an adult man and a mom of a son born with the condition.

title: This Thing Called Marriage
description: Demystifying Marriage

title: What the Fig
description:
What the Fig brings you an honest perspective on parenting from a holistic and humorous lens. 

Podcast by Hali Shields: An IBCLC, NBC-HWC with a speciality in functional medicine/women's health, and certified doula. 

Find us at @heyfiggi on IG, TikTok & Facebook
www.heyfiggi.com

title: Successfully Speaking
description:
“Successfully Speaking” hosted by Jessica Courtney-Rivera Owner/Operator of Lotus Family Education Center and Homeschool mom of 3 along with Tyler Smith-Barbosa Owner of The Apothecafery  and Homeschool Mom of 2. 
These two good friends homeschool their children while maintaining their families and growing their businesses.
 “Successfully Speaking” Podcast is a lifestyle podcast featuring discussions of homeschool, motherhood, marriage, entrepreneurship and how to balance it all as Jessica and Tyler share tips, tricks and juicy girl talk!!!
author_name: Jessica Simone Courtney-Rivera and Tyler Smith-Barbosa

title: Successful Student Transitions - A Time to Thrive
description:
Life is full of change and resulting periods of transition. 

For students, some of life’s big transitions begin as they move through education and then on to work, higher education, university and independent living.

Learning how to thrive through these early transitions provides invaluable skills for future change and transition.

This podcast shares insights and strategies to help students thrive in a world where change is the only constant. 

Content is relevant for students, educators and parents/carers.

title: Roxy Raves
description: A child friendly, short, fun, light hearted podcast where children talk and answer questions on todays topics.

title: RD2 Way Baseball Talk Podcast - from T-ball to MLB Discussion
description: First-round draft pick for the Boston Red Sox Ryan Dent pulls back the curtain on all things travel baseball. A one-on-one with parents, professional players, and coaches. No topic is off-limits.

title: The Non Perfect Parents Club
description:
Honest conversations about parenting led by me, Emma from The Non Perfect Parents Club. 
I'll be delving into each guest's thoughts, feelings and values when it comes to being a parent. I'm not afraid to speak the unspoken or the truths we all sometimes need to hear. Expect swearing, laughter, tears and to be able to sigh a big sigh of relief when you realise you're most definitely not alone when it comes to the rollercoaster ride of parenting. 
As always, the rule is no judgement allowed!

title: Harvest Birth Stories
description: For mothers by mothers. Harvest birth stories is based in the midwest, creating a warm space between mothers and the world. Whether you are pregnant, trying, a veteran mom or just love hearing inspiring birth stories, this place is a safe space for all mothers and birthing people in the world. We support moms pre, post and during birth. Follow along on instagram at @harvestdoula.

title: Thoughts of a woodsman preacher
description: Wilderness, wisdom and theology. Join me as we seek the truth of God from the prospective of rivers, woodlands and mountains.

title: bloom stories
description: Welcome to Bloom, the podcast where mums share their unfiltered birth experiences. We hope that by listening to their stories, you feel empowered and inspired, wherever you are on your own journey.

title: Faithfully Fit Motherhood
description: Join Elsie Olsen as she shares what she has learned on her journey while balancing faith, health, motherhood, and finances.

title: "Deadbeat" Daddy Podcast
description: Save the drama for your Momma! Catch me every week with a new episode in your very own no drama zone, where we talk about modern day co-parenting topics from the baby daddy's perspective. “Deadbeat’ Daddy Podcast is an unfiltered view on BMs who love to throw around the term “deadbeat” about their actually incredible baby daddy's!

title: Our Coffee Talks
description: Hello! My name is Katy. My daughter Caroline and I talk about everything under the sun and we want to bring you into our conversations.  Join us to hear us talk about our life experiences, perspectives and opinions when it comes to relationships, society and major life changes.  We can't wait to get started ... LET'S GO!

title: Beyond the Bump Audio Extras
description: Audio Companion tracks for Beyond the Bump workbook

title: It Takes 2 Dads
description:
It Takes 2 Dads podcast, is a general chit chat between 2 Dads and navigating through life with their 7 kids, through their journeys of Fostering, adoption and surrogacy.
Questions and suggestions to:
Email: ask@it2d.co.uk
Instagram: @ittakes2dads

title: MIKS KEEGI EI RÄÄKINUD
description:
"Miks keegi ei rääkinud" podcastis räägib Kristi oma isiklikke lugusid ning mõtteid elu õppetundidest. 

Kõige vahetumaid emotsioone jagab Kristi Instagramis @kristi.varik

title: Las TRES a las 3. Un pódcast para la prevención de la violencia sexual infantil
description: Las TRES a las 3 es un pódcast que se plantea como finalidad la prevención de la violencia sexual a la infancia. Tres niñas –de 10, 8 y 7 años–, una psicóloga y un profesor de periodismo dialogan, empleando un lenguaje sencillo y asequible, sobre los principales aspectos que hemos de tener en cuenta para que niños y niñas puedan detectar y rechazar posibles situaciones de violencia. Las TRES a las 3 es un material realizado por Jaime Alonso Ruiz y Carmela Guillén Gosálbez en colaboración con la Fundación Márgenes y Vínculos dentro del proyecto Mi cuerpo me pertenece, una propuesta para la prevención de la violencia sexual infantil creado con fondos públicos a través de la convocatoria con cargo al 0,7% del Impuesto sobre la Renta de las Personas Físicas del Ministerio de Derechos Sociales y Agenda 2030.
author_name: Carmela Guillén Gosálbez y Jaime Alonso Ruiz en colaboración con la Fundación Márgenes y Vínculos

title: A Mom & Her MUG
description: I am a mother who not only loves her children, I actually like them. Well, my oldest is one who will embrace a conversation with just about anyone, why not her own mom?! Listen in as we, "MUG 1" and "Mom U" talk, share and embrace space with each other on topics we plan or spring up because we just want to! Allow yourself a relaxing moment to hear a Mom and her Mugs talk about life and how we are taking each moment by moment. Thank you for tuning in!

title: SML (Sandwich Mom Life)
description: Sandwich Mom Life (SML), is hosted by award winning radio/ tv personality, Starlene Stringer. In addition to her on-air work, she's a best-selling author and a speaker. Starlene is also a wife, mom, sister, military brat and a caregiver for her mom, who has Alzheimer's. Hearing her humorously share how she juggles it all, reminds others, they can survive challenges too!

title: What's Goody podcast
description: The What’s Goody Podcast is all about real interviews with real people. Conversations about the low points in peoples journey, the fork in the road and the ”Why”. These conversations not only to educate but to inspire and motivate people. I am your host Logan Delgado a proud husband, a father of two girls and an entrepreneur. I lost a total of 70 pounds utilizing the ketogenic diet and intermittent fasting. I've now dedicated my life to help other parents just like me, to remind them that it’s never too late to take back control of your health and wellness.

title: Krákan og Grísurin
description:
Lurtið við, tá ið Laila og Marin loysa heimsins trupulleikar, flenna, fnisa og tosa um alt og einki!

Tað verður í hesum poddvarpið tosað opið og erligt um alt! Vit fara at tosa um familjulív, sex, parlag, børn og mangt annað - lívsins viðurskiftir sum heild!

Eingin partur hevur ein fastan leist, vit fara at viðgera ymisk evni, avbjóðingar og flenna eina rúgvu! Vónandi fara tit at dáma at lurta og flenna saman við okkum!

title: The M.I.L.F. Bod Podcast
description:
Welcome to The M.I.L.F. Bod Podcast. Mindful. Intuitive. Lifestyle. Fitness. - a weekly show that touches base on all things wellness, motherhood, and everything in between from lifestyle, beauty, mental health, relationships, sex, career advice, fitness routines, and how to balance it all. I'm your host, Cherokee Luker - mother, model, fitness trainer, and wellness enthusiast. Join me on this journey to becoming the most optimal version of ourselves. If you're looking to upgrade your life in any way, you've come to the right place. 

Subscribe to hear new episodes each week, and leave a review if this podcast speaks to you in any way. 

Find me on Instagram @cherokeeluker and the podcast @m.i.l.f.bodpod for inspiring content and updates!

https://instagram.com/cherokeeluker?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=

https://instagram.com/m.i.l.f.bodpod?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=

title: Britt and Sax
description:
Link to Our Patreon - www.patreon.com/brittandsax to support us and you'll gain exclusive access to our special Weekend Edition episodes, dropping every Sunday night!

We are Britt and Saxon, a married couple in Denver with 2 kids, ages 5 and 6. We are both full time parents and independent working artists (rapper/comedian Old Man Saxon and filmmaker/musician Baby Luck).

Life is busy and messy, and we both do so much and feel so much the other person doesn't appreciate or even know about. So we decided to create this podcast, where we will each sit down separately for 3 minutes, 4 nights a week, Monday thru Thursday, to record what happened for us that day. We will not edit or do multiple takes. When our 3 minutes are up, we stop. Then it's the next person's turn. Simple!

On the weekends, we record our 30 minute Weekend Edition together, where we review the week and finish unfinished business, available exclusively on Patreon for as little as $5/month.

Making this podcast together is our way of doing something consistently and simply, in the midst of all our respective long term creative goals and projects, that often drain us and leave us feeling depleted. We hope you'll come along on this journey with us as we find our way by being candid, honest and most importantly, seeing and listening to each other. We'll do this as long as it helps our marriage.

Thank you for being here with us! We hope this makes you feel more connected in an increasingly disconnected world.

Love,

Britt and Sax

title: Que Bola Hablan
description: Somos familia: La Tia y sus 3 Sobrinas de Tantas! We have fun talking to each other. We decided to add you all in our Bola de que Hablan...Y'all want to know what happens when we get together and talk about us, our songs, our stories, and our Familia. Take that ride with us!

title: Bible Study Podcast
description: Bible Study episodes focused on building community through shared experiences in being a mother, wife, & woman in today's society.

title: RICARDO BARRERA
description: A través de sus experiencias en los negocios, en la iglesia de Cristo y en sus viajes, se comparten mensajes y reflexiones practicas de la vida conectando todo a la palabra De Dios.

title: Raising Them Ready - Parenting Kids to Become Confident, Capable, and Kind
description: A podcast for parents who are doing the best they know how to raise kids to become confident, capable, and kind. Join family man, sociologist, and bestselling author Jonathan Catherman for relatable and highly relevant conversations about parenting in today's ever changing and often unpredictable world. You will be enriched, educated, and entertained as Jonathan and his guests discuss practical age-and-ability-appropriate ways to prepare your kids to launch and thrive in the everyday demands of life.

title: The Serial Leader Podcast
description: Being a Stay-At-Home Mom and Lessons on Home Leadership

title: Bethany Bible Study
description: Explore the Bible with Bethany House of Worship, Philadelphia, USA

title: Ready or Not
description:
Nervous about taking maternity leave and not even pregnant yet? Us too. This is Ready or Not, a podcast for and about mothers and parents who make work, work.

We publish content all week long via our podcast, Substack, and social channels.

Every Wednesday, we publish our flagship interview podcast, Ready or Not and every Friday, Ready or Not's new sister podcast, Witching Hour will land in your ears right here.

Every Sunday, Lucinda will share a deep dive essay on career and motherhood plus bonus fortnightly content on our Substack channel - readyornot.substack.com.

Every other day, you'll also find us talking to our community via @readyornot.pod

title: Special Needs Planning
description: We invite you to discover and experience the power of our services. We are an independent, boutique-style financial planning firm located in the Houston area. Our advisors bring their diverse backgrounds, education, and experience to best serve our clients. We are a holistic financial planning firm that specializes in Special Needs Planning.

title: Ninguém Disse Que Era Fácil
description:
Mas alguém disse que ia ser fácil? 

Conversas sobre parentalidade, onde tentamos aprender, em tempo real e a pensar alto, como é que isto se faz.

---

Para dúvidas, feedback ou sugestões, falem connosco através da nossa página de Instagram (@ninguemdissepodcast) ou do nosso endereço de email (ninguemdissepodcast@gmail.com).

title: Life Be Lifin'
description: A podcast focusing on real talk about real life situations

title: Adoption Podcasts
description:
Creating a number of podcasts which are adoption related. 

Aiming to address various matters such as : 

1.	Why adopt from India instead of domestic adoption in the country in which you live?
2.	Stigma 
3.	Inappropriate questions faced 
4.	Family Support – both Positive and Negative opinions
5.	Friend Support – both Positive and Negative opinions
6.	Acceptance once child is here - both Positive and Negative
7.	Treating the child differently if you have a birth child 
8.	Views on birth child and the impact the adoption will have 
9.	Background of the child and how important is it?
10.	My journey 
11.	Post adoption depression syndrome

title: Ordinary Moms of Extraordinary Kids
description: Bible Encouragement for Special Needs Moms

title: Mic'd In Bed
description: Married millennials Jaz & Josh talk dating as an interracial couple in rural Pennsylvania, their toddler's first curse word, and everything in between!

title: Stop Parenting & Start Coaching
description: Parenting children and teens who are athletes and performers provides a unique set of challenges. It requires parents to approach their relationships and interactions from a new perspective. The Stop Parenting & Start Coaching Podcast provides impactful insights that help parents create new approaches and transform their parenting. Join high performance coaches Nate & Steve on a fun and enlightening journey in the challenging and exciting world of parenting and coaching your teen athlete or performer!

title: Bump to Mum
description: Bump to Mum is a podcast that has been created by Emma who after the birth of her son Louie, realised that there was so much to learn and it is hard to know where to start. Comfort came from speaking with other Mum's and this is where Bump to Mum was born. The fourth trimester and beyond is a time of constant change and challenges, Bump to Mum is a platform to share conversations we have in baby groups and with other Mum's, learn from experts in their field, ask questions, find answers, share experiences and laugh and cry along the way as we all try to navigate the maze which is motherhood.

title: Trauma Talk
description: Sheryl, also known as Simply Natal or the Healing Birth Doula, mostly talking about trauma, birth trauma, other types of trauma, and what it means for those who are pregnant and giving birth, and what it means for those providing maternity care and education.

title: Papa Millennial
description: El podcast donde hablamos de la mágica, maravillosa, multifacética y aterradora experiencia de ser padre.

title: Motherhood Leaked
description: Join two first time mums leaking unfiltered, although sometimes edited tales of motherhood, being there, getting there & possibly getting lost along the way. Whether you’re peeing on a stick, pumping or wiping peas off the floor, you’re in good company. Chat soon!

title: R.E.P. Resources Empowering Parents
description: The Purpose of R.E.P. is to provide support to the Special Needs community in terms of helping families who are affected by special needs of a child or children and/or persons who work closely with individuals with special needs: Providing support, resources and education.

title: Momisms with AmiLyn Reece
description: What's your story? We are made up of stories. They are the building blocks of our lives from the time we come triumphantly into the world to the moments our hearts beat their last. We impact people. We impact our environment. We impact ourselves. Our stories are the sum of this impact, but as mothers, our role in our own stories is often overlooked. Momisms is a place to bring our stories into the forefront. It's time we become obsessed with our own stories, and I'm going to help you get there!

title: Feed the Bean
description: An exhausted father cooks gourmet-ish foods for his picky toddler, Beanie. As he chronicles this sometimes frustrating but often hilarious process, insights about cuisine, family, and parenthood are realized.

title: The Motherhood
description:
Being a new mom is hard. We get it! It's easy to feel alone, but we know that's never how God intended it. Welcome to THE MOTHERHOOD.

If you need professional parenting advice, clinically proven data, or study based evidence, please let us know where to find it because here at the motherhood we focus on sharing experiences, offering encouragement and understanding but most importantly friendship. We’re here to do motherhood TOGETHER.

title: Queer Vice
description:
We are two 40ish "Queer" women who have been friends for 20 years.
We have similar yet very different lifestyles and opinions! Deanna is a mother to 3 kids and a wife to Dina, to whom she has been married for 10 years. Jenn is an adoptive mother of one boy and newly married to her wife Chrissy. 
We will be answering questions about life and discussing everything we feel relevant to the "queer" world we are navigating.

title: The Salty Mums Podcast
description:
Two mums, both podcast listeners, both at the same church. But we
both felt there was something missing.

Whilst we loved our faith or parenting podcasts, few podcasts seemed to
bring the two together. And when they did, they were more about the
mechanics of parenting- sibling rivalry, getting your kids to read the Bible
etc. But what about dealing with all the cultural and social stuff we
encounter as Mum’s every day? Divorce, grief, diversity, money, mental
health, disability, going back to work, friendships, illness – the list is
endless but they affect our lives as mothers and our walk with Jesus.
When secular culture is talking about all these things and we can’t hear
God in the discussion it can seem confusing and isolating.

We felt called to add Jesus to the equation of life as a mum by sharing
women’s stories and experiences of how Jesus has impacted their
walk with him. Jesus tells us we’re “the salt of the earth” (Matt 5.13) and
we need to keep salty- that means in our whole lives and that means
we need to talk about where Jesus is in motherhood too.

title: Somehow I Dad
description: Somehow I Dad is a podcast of 4 Dads who talk about Dad Life from their own perspectives, share stories, and try to make each other better.

title: Fostering our Faith
description: Ever considered adoption? How about foster care? Maybe you were thrust into kinship care with no notice. Everyone's journey is so different, yet we all have the same heart, serving the children in our world. Having spent my entire teen years in care, and having over 20 foster children, 4 adoptions, including 2 with special needs, I understand "the system" just a bit more than most. Hello, my name is Angela Paganelli and I invite you to join us as we listen to people who are connected to the world of adoption and fostering, all while building our faith, encouraging our listeners, and hearing that we are not alone. Thank you for listening!

title: Life is - with Neil and Veronica
description: Join Neil & Veronica - a couple who fell in love in high school and are now parents to three children - as they talk about what life is to them while they continue to build and navigate life together one moment at a time.

title: Improvements with Kristen Grant
description:
Hi, I’m Kristen Grant and welcome to Improvements – the podcast dedicated to breaking free from the drift and living a more intentional, purpose-driven life. Through practical tips and tools, you'll be able to tap into your intuition, make better decisions, build empowering habits, and take control of your destiny.

With almost a decade of personal development and self-discovery under my belt, I've become passionate about helping others find their true path.

So, whether it's unlocking your intuition, boosting motivation, or creating a clear vision for the future, we'll explore it all. Are you ready? Let's embark on this transformative journey together and make profound Improvements.

title: Making Sense of Parenting
description:
Join Kelly Shoup, as she addresses your top parenting concerns from her unique lens and offers wisdom, support, understanding and solutions so parents are fully equipped to handle ALL aspects of raising children in a peaceful and loving way.  You'll quickly recognize, she gets it!  She's a mother of 3, parenting expert, child behavior specialist and pediatric occupational therapist with over 20 years success helping families.
https://www.kellykshoup.com/

title: Adulting....WTF with Lady Queen A
description: Remember when we were little and couldn't wait to grow up and now that we are adults and now we are constantly saying WTF! I don't want to do this anymore. Come join me, and we discuss LIFE (lol) There is no manual we learn as we go and hope we doing it right.

title: Raising Christian Teens in 10 Minutes
description: Parenting is hard... actually its a struggle and it's ok to admit that.  God is perfect and he struggles with his children :) So tune in to some Real talk on how to raise teens to find their purpose and passion and become strong leaders!

title: CMO: Chief Mothering Officer
description:
Grab a coffee, your headset and some diapers, and traverse down my path of post-pandemic parenting and ladder-climbing. 

Be the mother and be the executive.

title: Desahógate Mamá
description: Soy Isabella Visbal, su host en Desahógate Mamá, un podcast creado como un espacio para desahogarnos juntas de todo lo que conlleva la maternidad.

title: Biblically Centered
description:
Biblically Centered equips your family with knowledge and conversations to help you live and defend your Christian faith. 

Sometimes it is hard to know how to "live like Christ." We want to help you know how to practically do that and teach your children to do the same. By focusing on one biblical virtue a week, your efforts will have more impact and a lasting impression on your children. We are excited for your family's knowledge of God to increase, your love for Him to grow, and your family to be a light in the darkness.

Join us each week as we discuss one of our 24 Biblical Family Virtues!

title: Mama Rantz
description:
Life & Motherhood... Uncensored.

Real, Raw, & Honest.

Come be our new Mom Friend!

In Mama Rantz, co-hosts Ali & Ell dish the dirt on pregnancy, childbirth, motherhood, marriage, and life in general, in this honest, no BS, comedic lifestyle podcast. Get to know the girls as they go against the grain and tell it like it is, at least for them, and help you feel good about the parent you are. So come join in on the ranting!

title: Mom Life Handbook
description:
As a mom, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed and exhausted by the constant juggle of caring for your family, managing a household + maintaining your own sense of purpose and identity. What if, instead, you found yourself feeling confident and at ease in your role as a mom? No more overwhelm, no more stress. Just practical parenting strategies, time-saving tips, and sustainable daily routines that make mom life simpler and more enjoyable. That's exactly what you'll get with the Mom Life Handbook Podcast.

The Mom Life Handbook Podcast is the ultimate resource for millennial moms of preschoolers who want to simplify mom life. Created by master K-8 teacher and mom of two, Erin Christopoulos, this podcast is designed to help you cut through the stress and overwhelm of motherhood with practical parenting strategies, time-saving tips, and sustainable daily routines.

By tuning in, you'll gain access to expert insight that not only offers realistic advice and simple strategies, but also helps you feel less alone and more supported in your parenting journey. So if you're ready to simplify your approach to mom life, make the most of your precious time and energy, and create a mom life you absolutely love, hit subscribe now and join the community of millennial moms who are taking control of their lives with this podcast.

Be sure to 👉 hit subscribe 👈 so new episodes land at the top of your feed + you can dive in right away.

And for all the show notes + more information on how to work with Erin, be sure to visit MomLifeHandbook.com.

title: Unlimited Parenting
description: Idaho Parents Unlimited (IPUL) is Idaho's parent training and information center and family to family health information center. We support children with disabilities and their families in the form of training, information and resources around school and community based systems. title: Failing Up
description:
Despite adequate middle-class incomes and upbringing, we fail in so many ways. 
We’re fairly confident anyone could do this better. 
We are just getting by, succeeding sometimes despite our failures, and no one notices. It’s amazing.

title: Mom Bod Pod
description: This is a space for mamas to find themselves again by becoming their healthiest selves, inside and out. Mamas who set goals and achieve them. Who wake up with confidence and excitement to start the day. Who are energized to connect with their families. Who want to show their kids what it means to be a powerful woman. You are seen and heard here.

title: Single Moms Unfolded
description:
The Single Moms Unfolded was created for single moms, by a single mom, to help single moms through connections, stories, expert advice, and strategies. Kelly Viera is a single mom of an 11-year girl who spent six years trying to figure it all out. After exhausting efforts of learning things the hard way, she decided to make it her mission to help other single moms take the shortcut to their new life. To pick up the pieces of the chaos and create a wonderful life for their family. This podcast was created to empower, support, encourage, and love single moms. You are not alone, so tune in to join our tribe.

Subscribe for more:

Single Moms Unfolded - YouTube

Single Moms Unfolded was created by Kelly Viera the owner and founder of My Happy Place. Kelly is dedicated to helping single moms keep their heads above water after divorce for themselves and their children without anxiety and fear so they can move forward with courage, support, and peace of mind. We offer one on one coaching, online self-study courses, and workshops. Let us help you stop the struggle contact us at Kelly@myhappyplaceforlife.com

Don’t forget to follow us on IG @myhappyplace4life

title: Messy in the Middle: The Journey of Infertility Podcast
description: We are led to believe that falling pregnant is just a matter of having unprotected sex and voila! Reality hits hard. Recurrent miscarriage and infertility are unfortunately a truth so many of us face, and Jessica Leigh is right there in the trenches with you – struggling with secondary infertility, 2 losses - which could have been many more if she didn’t advocate for herself and fight to get answers before continuing to try again. Messy in the Middle is a podcast featuring real women’s stories about their journey, the messy part, the trials and tribulations to get from recurrent miscarriage and infertility to baby. Join us as we talk, cry, laugh and get unbelievably vulnerable to feel less alone in the gang that no one wanted to be a part of.

title: Momprehension
description: Hey fellow mom warriors!  How are YOU feeling? Are you on top of the world? Or are you on that 3rd cup of coffee and still waiting for it to kick in?  If you're like us, it might just depend on the day.  Join co-hosts Cynthia Hunnefeld and Evette Canino as they talk about motherhood and all its ups and downs.  Are you a stay-at-home, homeschooling, helicopter mom like Cynthia? Or are you more of a techy, right-brained, list making mom and educator like Evette?  No matter what kind of maternal figure you are, we know you are just fabulous!  Join us in our judgement free zone as we continue to navigate motherhood, while trying not to lose ourselves in the process.  Do we have the momprehension needed to raise our little ones?  Listen to find out!

title: Wir erleben anders
description:
Dieser Podcast bietet Eltern, Betroffenen, Fachpersonen und anderen Zuhörer*innen viele Informationen zum Thema Autismus-Spektrum. Ein besonderer Fokus wird dabei auf Kinder im Autismus-Spektrum und Hilfestellungen für deren Umfeld gelegt. Wir sprechen mit Fachärzt*innen, Therapeut*innen, Selbstbetroffenen und deren Eltern unter anderem über die Diagnostik, Behandlung und den Alltag von und mit Kindern im Autismus-Spektrum.

Das Autismuszentrum Sonnenschein bietet für Kinder im Autismus-Spektrum unterschiedliche, auf das jeweilige Kind zugeschnittene Therapieangebote. Das interdisziplinäre Behandlungsteam bestehend aus den Fachrichtungen Medizin, Psychologie, Musiktherapie, Ergotherapie und Logopädie ist speziell für die Arbeit mit Kindern im Austismus-Spektrum ausgebildet. Ihr Wissen stellt das Team nun in unserem Podcast zur Verfügung.

Egal ob Sie bereits viel über das Autismus-Spektrum wissen oder sich ganz neu mit dem Thema auseinandersetzen wollen - wir sind überzeugt unser Podcast hat für alle etwas zu bieten und wünschen viel Spaß beim Hören!

Weitere Informationen zu unserer Arbeit finden Sie unter www.autismuszentrum-sonnenschein.at

Ein Transkript des Podcast steht unter https://rss.com/podcasts/autismuszentrum-sonnenschein/ zur Verfügung.

title: I'm not ok....and that's ok
description:
"Thinking out Loud" is the podcast for the non-profit organization, Love Me As I Am (LMAIA), LMAIA's main focus is neurodivergent children and their parents/caregivers. In this first episode we will be discussing receiving your child's diagnosis, in this case, the diagnosis is level two Autism. We will talk about about what it took to get to this point, the missed milestones, the diagnosis, and life after the diagnosis. We will discuss what the diagnosis meant for the child, as well as the family. Being a parent/caregiver is hard, and there are a variety of emotions involved, listen as we tackle this maze and understand that it's ok not to not feel ok somedays.

Music courtesy of KJ Sawka at KJSAWKA.com

title: M(other) Artist Podcast
description:
The M(other) Artist Podcast is a collaboration between Megan Hosmer, Claire Drummond and Rena Thomas. The term "m(others)" encompasses both "mothers" and "others," including gender non-conforming and queer folks, who see themselves engaged in nurturing and sustaining life. In this podcast, we interview Kjipuktuk Halifax-based visual artists who are also primary caregivers about their experiences navigating parenting and the art world. We discuss the ways in which their art practices have been impacted by parenthood, navigating how care work can be both an exceedingly disruptive force as well as a profound emotional experience that can expand our conceptions of art-making, interdependency and existence.

Cover art by David Drummond

title: Conversando En Pareja - "No estás Solo"
description:
¡Bienvenidos a nuestro apasionante podcast! 🎙️💡

En cada episodio, esta pareja te sumergirá en cautivadoras conversaciones que exploran una amplia variedad de temas. Desde tecnología y emprendimiento, hasta la crianza de hijos y mucho más, ¡lo abordamos todo!

Descubre una visión auténtica y fácilmente identificable de nuestras vidas a través de nuestras experiencias personales, triunfos y obstáculos. Nuestro podcast te ofrece discusiones animadas y perspicaces que te mantendrán enganchado.

Con valiosas perspectivas, consejos prácticos y anécdotas inspiradoras, buscamos brindarte un contenido relevante y entretenido. Te acompañaremos en tu camino, ya sea que estés buscando inspiración, consejos o simplemente una agradable charla.

Explora el fascinante mundo de la tecnología, el emprendimiento, la crianza de hijos y mucho más con nosotros.

Sintoniza nuestro podcast y únete a la conversación. ¡No te lo pierdas!

#podcast #tecnología #emprendimiento #crianzadehijos #experienciaspersonales #consejos #inspiración #entretenimiento #contenidoauténtico #charlaamena #perspectivas #aprendizaje

title: More Than Just Roommates
description: Welcome to "More than just roommates", a podcast where we explore the journey of entrepreneurship and talk about where we currently are in our lives. We give the RAW behind the scenes of what its like having two kids and running businesses and how those things come in to play in our relationship.

title: The Real Postpartum Experience
description:
A podcast featuring raw, unfiltered postpartum experiences told by real people.

Instagram

@the_real_postpartumexperience

title: Porque soy tu madre... María Inés
description:
Soy mamá de 3 niños que busca dar luz a los problemas del día a día que nos desafían en el camino de la crianza que a veces llegamos a sentir tortuoso, desalentador y extenuante.

No estamos solas, todas surfeamos esas olas todos los días, desde el momento en que nos enteramos que otro ser se está formando dentro de nosotros, hasta el día que dejemos de existir.

Es por eso que busco contrarrestar esos instantes, esos momentos o etapas en las cuales nos sentimos desamparadas, poco comprendidas o juzgadas. Apuesto al bienestar mental de nuestros hijos para crear relaciones intrafamiliares mucho más seguras y sanas, a pesar de que ese bienestar mental represente sin duda una de las mayores responsabilidades como cuidadores.

Porque soy tu madre te cuido, porque soy tu madre te escucho, porque soy tu madre te perdono y me perdono, porque soy tu madre te acompaño, porque soy tu madre te respeto, porque soy tu madre te guio, porque soy tu madre te amo, porque soy tu madre te agradezco.

title: Kinderschmarrn
description:
Kinderschmarrn nimmt euch mit auf unseren Weg vom erfahren der Schwangerschaft über die Geburt und die Zeit danach, bis zum Alltag mit Kindern. Ganz zwanglos und ehrlich geben wir euch Einblick in alle Sorgen, Themen, Glücks- und Weinmomente die uns widerfahren sind und laden euch ein, auch eure Geschichten mit uns zu teilen. Denn wenn eines klar ist, dann: Ihr seid mit euren Sorgen nicht alleine - auch wenn man sich oft so fühlen kann.

Dabei erhaltet ihr alle 14 Tage nicht nur die Sicht der Mama sondern auch des Papas im Dialog rund ums Kinder kriegen.

Comunicación efectiva, conexión, empatía y armonía familiar.

title: The Transform Together Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Transform Together podcast, where we explore the power of collaboration to support families and individuals with unique needs. We are your co-hosts, Leslie Giddings and Dannielle Samuel, co-founders of Transform Together and experts in parenting, education consulting, group and individual counselling, and working with neurodiversity and mental health.

In this podcast, we'll be sharing insights, strategies, and stories from our experiences working with families, individuals, and organizations.

We'll be diving deep into topics such as parenting strategies for neurodiverse children, navigating the education system, group and individual counselling, and mental health support. Our guests will include experts in these fields, as well as individuals who have personal experiences with these challenges.

At Transform Together, we believe that everyone has a unique perspective and set of skills to contribute to the collective effort of supporting and empowering individuals with unique needs. By coming together and sharing our knowledge and experiences, we can create a more compassionate and understanding world.

Join us on our journey to transform the world together. Be sure to subscribe to this podcast to stay up-to-date on our latest episodes. Learn more about our work at transformtogether.ca.

title: Single Seeking Sperm
description: Hello all!! My name is Angela and Im a single mom by choice. I started Single Seeking Sperm as a show to talk about a number of things. Of course my journey as an SMBC but also as it pertains to infertility, having a NICU baby and just over all how becoming a mother has been an absolute rollercoaster ride!!! I’ve been through a lot of serious shit, so I try to laugh as much as possible. Mostly at myself. I’m just tryna keep this kid and myself alive. So far so good! Thanks for listening! Please follow on IG @singleseekingsp3rm

title: Three Mums and a Podcast
description: Where we laugh, cry and delve into the rollercoaster ride that is parenthood.

title: Summer and Maddog
description: Welcome to our safe space to vent, cry, and spill the tea. Military spouses spill the fun on motherhood, deployment, overseas life, and more. The unfiltered world that we call day to day life.

title: Motherhood: Behind the Scenes
description:
Motherhood: Behind the Scenes explores conversations with mothers who have been through various stages of their motherhood journey on their way to find their authentic selves.

These are stories of growth, advocacy, and diminishing the myth of perfectionism in modern motherhood. Letting go of our expectations, I chat with mothers about their transition into motherhood (the good and the bad) and how they were able to find themselves again along the way.

Mamas it IS possible.

Let's go behind the scenes.

title: The Follow Up
description: In a weekly show that started in 2020, Noah & his now 8-year-old daughter Eden turn on the microphone for a conversation on the chat about a topic of her choice. These chats are meant to entertain audiences of all ages, but most importantly to build confidence in young children learning how to actively listen & communicate effectively. The Follow Up stems from a simple concept: ask a question, listen to the answer, then follow up.

title: Mom's on Meds
description:
Mom's on Meds is a podcast for moms who have struggled with or are currently walking through mental illness. Join me as I share my journey toward becoming mentally healthy, and have honest conversations with other moms who are doing the same. The hope for this podcast is to bring awareness to the existence and expression of mental illness, particularly in how it impacts motherhood, and to encourage you with the truth that your best days are yet to come.

Disclaimer: This podcast is not qualified to offer medical advice. It exists purely to offer stories of individual triumph, share helpful resources, and serve as a positive voice in the mental health arena.

title: The Paternity Press
description:
Welcome to "The Paternity Press", a podcast that documents the journey of becoming a dad. Join your host, John Warder, a first-time father, as he narrates his experiences from anticipating the arrival of his daughter to becoming a full-fledged girl dad.

From diapers to first steps, he'll take you on the front lines of fatherhood with honest conversations, a few dad jokes, and interviews with fellow fathers. With humor and candor, John explores the challenges and joys of raising a child and offers insights for other dads who are on the same journey.

Whether you're a new dad, a seasoned pro, or just curious about what parenthood is really like, "The Paternity Press" is the podcast for you. So grab a cup of coffee, sit back, and join John as he navigates the exciting and sometimes overwhelming world of fatherhood.

title: The Dadisms Podcast

title: The Leading for Children Podcast
description: The Leading for Children podcast brings together the adults in the young child’s life for conversations that explore the collective impact we have on children during their most formative years.

title: Coffee on the Couch - Neurodiversity Podcasts
description:
When one person in the family has received diagnosis (or investigating the possibility) of having learning disability, it doesn’t just affect the child or individual. It affects the whole family. Everyone in the family will try to understand what it means, and what adjustments may need to be made to accommodate their neurodiverse needs.

Knowledge of these difficulties often leaves parent with the dilemma of understanding how to balance parenting with compassion for their child's difficulties. How do I help my child understand and come to terms with this? Which part of their behaviour is them really being unable to do something, and which part is just them testing their boundaries. How do you balance your parenting with compassion for your child's needs? It is an emotional journey and a vulnerable place to be and it can affect people's mental health.

In this series we will be sharing personal stories, grow our understanding of specific learning difficulties, and share tips and advice to live confidently and compassionately with your own or your child's neurodiversity. ​

Our mission is to empower families and individuals with specific learning difficulties (SpLD) to,

  • understand, and have compassion with your own and each other's strengths and difficulties,

  • take accountability to improve your skills and reach your potential,

  • build resilience, so your difficulties won't define who you are.

title: The Follow Up
